comments: Great fun game. Only reason I didn't give it a 5 is because you go through your money pretty quick buying boosts to win levels to then upgrade your garden. I like the game a lot. Also I think that at the end of your board if you have undetonated items they should detonate at the end of that level. I've lost too many levels because of not getting one item that was next to something that was undetonated.

I Love Gardenscapes and It Is Fun Way to Be Creative.  A Recent Update has Made it Definitely Better.  The Support Team Has Been Exceptional With Quick Responses and Answers!  There is Room for Improvement in the Amount of Coins Obtained in Completing Tasks, as Well as Eliminating Repetitious Tasks Requiring More Moves.

I love home scape but it can be quite spendy. Both games are fun.  Love graphics animation laughter now free gifts.  Gardens cape is even more fun doesn't get boring like home scape when pay to win is obvious.  Gardens scape takes 1 or 2 coins with easier quests.   Still favorite.  Home scapes got greedy please return again where its not pay to win.  At times we need a color no bonus and lose because home scape didn't offer the color.  Spending hundreds on home scape so thinking of my budget and returning to garden scape.  Gardens cape started it all. Please lower prices

Either make the puzzles easier or give more Passes to actually be able to pass the level ....make it easier to get to other rooms, too many attention to details..also so many tokens should be able to buy a few stars... I've been on the same room level since I started playing and way past level 100. Starting to get bored at this point.

Much has improved since my original review (see below). There are special events going on quite often to help with earning coins and powerups, and the levels don't seem to be as tedious. Keep it up, guys!   "I love this game but the levels are often too hard to beat without power-up help, and it takes so long to earn coins. Most of my friends have quit playing"

The reward for finishing a puzzle is around 50 to 60 coins. It cost 900 coins for 5 extra turns, and 1200 for the next. It has taken me up to 3 weeks playing all my lives as much as possible to finish 1 puzzle. This game is designed to frustrate you into spending money so you can complete the puzzles. Which I wouldn't mind if it was rewarded more fairly. Play Monsterbusters, it is by far more fun, you earn better rewards, and you can buy new lives and power-ups with your coins at a much more fair rate.
description: Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory. Embark on an adventurous journey: beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the garden, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters, including Austin, your butler, and a funny dog! What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some gardening and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream garden for free! The game features:● Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!● Hundreds of unique match-3 levels● Dozens of in-game characters you can make friends with● An adorable puppy who is always there to cheer you up● An in-game social network you can use to keep tabs on everything● Different areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, an old mansion, and much more● A community that comes first — be neighbors with your Facebook friends!● A super addicting game you can even play offline! Gardenscapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Gardenscapes? Learn more about the game!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GardenscapesInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/gardenscapes_mobile/Twitter: https://twitter.com/garden_scapes Questions? Contact our tech support at gardenscapes@playrix.com

description: The moms are testing the dads’ mettle in this fun take on an age-old debate! Who will end up victorious?  ♂️ ♀️We’ve all been there, whether as parents or kids – why aren’t chores split evenly in the family? Why does one person always seem to do almost everything (❗) and, most importantly, what can you do about it? Emily and Patrick face (and answer!) this question in Emily’s newest story, Moms vs Dads!  ♂️ ♀️🏆 Manage both dads and moms in this fun time management story game!🏆 Play your way through 60 story levels plus 30 challenge levels🏆 Get to know the differences between the four couples! Who will you be rooting for?🏆 Take in six fun locations including favorites like Camp Talon and Emily’s house🏆 Earn diamonds and build your own kids’ paradise in Emily’s back yard🏆 Beat daily challenges to earn extra diamonds🏆 Collect all the postcards and send heartfelt greetings to all your loved ones🏆 Help Emily and Patrick discover what is truly important in lifeEmily is thrilled with her family, but now that she has three kids, it seems there’s 10 times the work! Balancing her work in the diner, her cooking vlog, her chores AND her family is getting harder and harder. When she notices Patrick acting like playing with the kids occasionally is him doing his fair share, she decides she’s had enough! 👶🏻 👶🏽Her girlfriends all have similar experiences - men who don’t help out in the house unless asked, men who only “babysit” their own kids…. and they’ve had enough! It’s time to ACT, and show them how much work it really is. Can the girls get their men dashing around the house, or will this end up being a recipe for disaster?

descriptionHTML:
Join the BEST WATER FIGHT of your life! Pack your water balloons. Grab your water guns. Get ready for the mission and get your opponents soaking wet! Plan a sneaky attack and collect the other team’s Coins and Energy. Use them to BUILD AN UNBEATABLE CAMP! And upgrade your Camp as fast as you can to get cool water weapons before your enemies!

Play this brand new, cool water fighting battle builder game – it’s amazing fun!

★★★HOW TO BE THE BEST★★★

★ BUILD YOUR CAMP
Construct an unbeatable Camp. Be quick and set it up before the other teams see you. Set up your Troop Shop, Hero Hall, Tower, Coin Factory, Energy Generator, and more. Level up your Minivan and the buildings in your Camp to get the best weapons and the most Energy to beat the other teams.

★ DEFEND & PLAN ATTACKS
Set up defenses like the Sprinkler, Tower, Puddle, Catapult, Cannon, and more. Protect your Troops, your Camp, and your Coins while you plan a unique water fight strategy! Build up your Troops and lead them to glory! Make the invaders run away!

★ WIN THE WATER FIGHT!
Grab your Water Gun, Slingshooter, Wingsuits, and other weapons. Use the right tactics and head straight into the action! Test your skills and train yourself to perfection in the SINGLE PLAYER Campaign episodes. Attack your enemies and fight in the mega MULTIPLAYER online battles. Progress through the levels and join your Troops with those of other players. That way you can play in even bigger battles! These serious fights are serious fun!

★ COLLECT GOLD & ENERGY
Win the most exciting water battle of the summer and level up! Collect Coins and Energy from other online players and use them to upgrade your Camp. Get your opponents' resources before they get yours or… Sneak behind enemy lines and steal them!

Hurry up! Join kids and adults all over the world and WIN THE WATER FIGHT in this amazing battle builder game with incredible design!

Talking Tom Camp is a free game with the option to purchase items to help you progress through the levels faster.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and third party advertising

comments: In love with it every second I used it. Have been missing it on my Coolpad Note 3 due to certain glitches with my copy of Warriors Orochi & Orochi 2. The MALI-T720 really sucks. But loving it again on my Lenovo Z2 Plus with Snapdragon 820 and Vulkan. Love the fast forward key, it makes me go LOL sometimes in games. Soon going to buy the Gold Version now as I have a better compatible device. Thank you dev for such a pleasurable claasic experience. Love ya. 😃

After the recent update, the app is crashing quite frequently. Hopefully this will be fixed soon. But Vulcan support is appreciated, it seriously improves frame rate and audio, plus the texture looks nicer too. It's a blessing I can play persona 3 on my phone. Haven't tried many other games though. Will edit and update the score once the game crashes are improved. Lastly, thank you to the developer for this amazing emulator.

This has continued to be an amazing app! The ability to run most PSP games flawlessly on my phone is incredible. My PSP broke a while back and I haven't had the money to buy the system again. I had missed playing my favorite PSP games. Now I still can! I highly recommend this app! I also recommend trying Dead Head Fred on it! Fantastic PSP title!

I use a Samsung Galaxy Note 8 (yes the best-of-the-best). And as soon as I selected Vulkan, instead of OpenGL all my games like Midnight Club 3, Midnight Club LA and even Gran Turismo works SUPER FAST AND ON AMAZING 5x PSP resolution. The only thing disappointing is that the emulator doesn't work full screen. *PLEASE ADD FULL SCREEN SUPPORT FOR SAMSUNG GALAXY NOTE 8*. BEST PSP EMULATOR.

Awesome app.... loved it... But due to 2 problems I am not able to play the best of the best psp games like G O W and Assassin's Creed, etc. 1. Calibration is not working. The default calibration is only in place even after calibraling it from many different angles. There is no change to the tilt even after calibration. 2. multitap compatibility in OnePlus 3t. I am not able to use the R and X and analog buttons at the same time which is a very needed combination in Assassin's Creed.... Plz.. Fix this issue.... Due to these I am not able to play even God Of War in this app.... plz.. plz.. plz.. plz... fix this......

Its a fantastic emulator and the best .. using it since 3 years..!! Gameplay is Great.. Graphics could be improved.. Sound is Glitchy (metal gear solid - peace walker).. fix it soon...!! ❤️ You PPSSPP..!!  *Cheats- I'm unable to use it.. (Make it happen soon.. probably the next update 😇) Best app on Playstore for me..!!😍😍😍 Make enhancements for HiKirin Socs.. Creators  of  PPSSPP .. please make an emulator for ps2 also (it's my wish)
description: Play PSP games on your Android device, at high definition with extra features!PPSSPP is the original and best PSP emulator for Android. It runs a lot of games, but depending on the power of your device all may not run at full speed. No games are included with this download. Use your own real PSP games and turn them into .ISO or .CSO files, or simply play free homebrew games, which are available online. Put those in /PSP/GAME on your SD card / USB storage.This is the free version. If you want to support future development, please download PPSSPP Gold instead.See http://www.ppsspp.org for more information, and see the forums for game compatibility information.

comments: Hey... I would give this game 5 stars but there is 1 main -VE POINT. FUEL takes TOOOOOOOO LONG TO RECHARGE.  The point of this game is to playyyyyy the game. I don't want to keep waiting. I downloaded your great game TO PLAY it. Please try to solve this issue. I will definitely give you 5 stars if you fix this. Please listen to us and read our comments. Most of us are mentioning this 1 -ve point. Thank you

Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

Really good idea let down massively by the developers. Progress is extremely slow due to fuel taking so long to recharge and having to use gems to buy new vehicles. So unless you want to spend all your money on a free game, it doesn't really feel like you're getting anywhere.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

It shouldn't be easier to level up rather than actually playing game. I wouldn't say that the gameplay is difficult to play, but the purposefully placed trucks that shoot you is a bit ridiculous. Other cars are in the way which ultimately eliminates you before you can attack the shooting trucks. There really is no challenge except trying to beat your previous score. I give this game an eh out eh.

comments: As expected, it looks and performs amazing. Fighting mechanics and modes are pretty innovative and thrilling. It is quite stupid to compare the console version with mobile one. Each one has its own unique style, so they should NOT look the same, cz' each one provides the fans with a different gaming experience. This surely increases the already huge number of fans of Tekken. 5 🌟 game

WOW, great memories came back. Amazing graphics, and story is going good so far. Only thing is the controles, I mean you should have given the original TEKKEN controls with the moves n all. Its now like a small kid can play. Their is no fun n pressure of making the right punch or through as the good old days. If you guys can make a lit like that, then its will more gold in a gold mine. Otherwise is a nice game.  Thank you

Samsung Galaxy S6... Alright, they went and fixed the release bug crashes within a day or two. I finally got to enjoy the game. It's pretty decent. I'm enjoying the whole fighting/build your characters concept. As promised, I've raised my rating. (Probably could give more on the post mission drops) other than that, I love how there isn't a limit to how many missions you can do and have to wait for an energy bar to replenish. Great game so far. (Give more on the drops though lol... seriously)

First off, the thought of the game and concept of direction it went in for a mobile game is fair, I'll give it that. But... I will say, being one of the best franchises ever created, I expected more. Not another knockoff style of Marvel and DC's (and MK's) style of fighting game. I expected originality from an original creator. The having to heal and near impossibility of play at a certain point (unless you pay a lot...) steered me away from it, tbh.

As a long time Tekken fan I am happy that we have a version for mobile. I am also quite impressed with how smooth the gameplay is. The graphics are impressive for mobile. I'm underwhelmed by the controls though.  For me Tekken is all about the controls, and while I didn't expect a full controller interface. I feel like there could have been a better control layout available. Also the interface and game play menus feel quite busy, like there is too much going on. They could take a note from the wb fighters on mobile in this regard.

As a lifelong Tekken fan this game is about as good as you could get for a mobile game. Sure there's microtransactions but they don't feel shoved down your throat and you'll get a decent amount of fun before they feel remotely neccesary. The gameplay is good, simpler but as concise and impactful as it always is. The only thing that I've found off putting so far is some of the writing is a bit... off. Just some out if character stuff but the story dialogue is mostly setup so it's not too bad.  Overall this is definitely worth a try if you want Tekken on the go.

comments: I have been playing this game for a while now, and I still love it. Because even though its characters share similarities with characters in other MOBA's, they still have there own original flare that makes playing them much different then other characters from other MOBA's, and the one character that I have absolutely fallen in love with is Olivia. Because not only has she added some relevance to the jungle, she is everything I believe an assassin should be, she has a unique play style, she takes some thought and skill to use correctly, and she dominates late game with her damage output. The only problem I have now is that the older characters like beldora, skarlet, angelyne and car in have fallen far behind as actual characters.

This game is perfect except for two issues. First, when I play ranked match the ping gets so high and it gets lag, but when I play other modes it's working well. Second are the controls. There are instances every game that my joystick randomly makes my hero move without my control. Please fix this and this game will be perfect.

It's a pretty good moba. I don't rly write reviews.  I'm only giving 4 stars, because I just started 15 matches in ranked and i. At 100% win rate..im starting to think were playing with bots..im already ranked gold. Add opath if u wanna team up

i think the game should has more items, items that have evasion, and items that gives both attack or magic and defense and heros should have mana limits. but perks should have less cooldowns with less effects but buffs should last longer this way the game will be more ingaging when there is more bottons to tap. i wrote all these to improve the game. i mean i compare this game to Dota 2. and thank you developers in general and for making  new heros all the time.

comments: I love this game. It's very dynamic and the gameplay is good too. The only problem I have is every single time I do PvP... It pairs me with an opponent far greater than what I can hope to beat. Sure, that's great for improving, but it disheartens me and makes me feel like a horrible player when I can't even beat ONE PvP opponent, ever, while playing the game. I would suggest to the devs that the matching system be a little more flexible when pairing. Give us a matching system that will actually give us lesser prepared players too so we can have the fun of winning, as well. Also, I am disconnected every single time I do PvP battles and bounties. Quite unstable, unfortunately.

Amazing shooter game, awesome hero collecting game, great multiplayer game. Definitely suggest that you at least try it out. But one thing you should look out for, it's pretty easy to sink between 5 and 20 dollars a week into this. Sometimes even 40 to 60. But, it's pretty free-to-play friendly if you can't afford to buy some gold.

I really like the game. It's fun and has enough activities and quests to keep you occupied for a while. My only complaint is how they match people up for the PVP missions. Sometimes you get matched up with people with far higher power and Team level menu which makes it nearly impossible to win. other than that I really enjoy the game

Super fun game. I haven't got bored of the game because there's always events going on which is good. One of the better if not the best shooting game I've played. I think there is a slight glitch when using Steele. Sometimes after I activate his open fire skill he doesn't shoot when I press the shoot button.

Latest update definitely made the game harder. I used to run 4 gauntlet levels with little issue but now I can't get through 1 without losing people. Resurrected characters are completely unwelcome and unfair in pvp when you tell on kills for money. Probably going to uninstall, you're welcome for the money Hothead

Starts off ok but then the pay walls creep in and you are constantly bombarded with prompts to spend money. The PVP is absolutely pointless, highest power rating wins every time without exception so you know if you've won or lost as soon as it picks an opponent. Needs a lot of work before I'd consider dropping any real money on it.

description: In Asphalt 8, you’ll race in some of the hottest, most high-performance dream machines ever created, from cars to bikes, taking them on a global tour of speed. From the blazing Nevada Desert to the tight turns of Tokyo, you’ll find a world of challenge, excitement & arcade fun on your road to the top!REAL LUXURY DREAM CARS & MOTORCYCLES!• Over 190 high-performance cars & bikes to drive & push beyond their limits.• Top licensed manufacturers & models: the Lamborghini Veneno, Bugatti 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse, Ferrari LaFerrari, McLaren P1, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Ducati Monster 1200 & more, including a selection of racing motorbikes!• Newly recorded high-fidelity motor sounds for realistic audio immersion.• Customize & upgrade your rides with over 2,300 decals to take down opponents with style!GET AIRBORNE WITH ASPHALT 8• Hit the ramps & take the race beyond the limits of physics, breaking free from gravity into the sky with a car or bike!• Perform barrel rolls & wild 360º jumps to soar past your opponents.• Maneuver through the air, pulling off insane stunts in your car or motorcycle to maximize your speed & find a fast route to the goal.EXOTIC NEW LOCATIONS• Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!• Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that’s sure to keep you on your toes.• Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. Mastering them is sure to raise your game to the top of the competition!AN ENDLESS STREAM OF CONTENT FOR SPEED FREAKS!• 9 seasons & over 400 events in Career mode, with plenty of challenges for even the most experienced car & motorcycle riders.• Stunning visuals thanks to next-gen shaders, real-time geometry reflection & other amazing HD effects.• Check out the Infected & Gate Drift modes for a fresh twist on racing.• Win top prizes in the Limited-Time Cups, including early access to some of the latest cars in the game!• A detailed damage system.THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE!• Gear up for simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real players!• Multiplayer Seasons & Leagues! Race your best against other players to score points & unlock prizes in limited-time Racing Seasons.• Dare friends to asynchronous races as you chase your rivals’ ghost cars & bikes across the track.• Compare scores on the new leaderboards with friends & rival riders around the world.• Share your racing achievements & prove that you’re the ultimate speed machine.MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL• A heart-thumping mix of amazing music licensed for Asphalt 8 to drive your need for fast arcade racing.CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION• Rearrange your on-screen icons & controls however you like to customize & optimize your style of play. So, are you ready for a real HD stunt-racing experience? Can you handle the Ferrari, Mercedes, or Audi of your dreams, among dozens of high-octane motorcycles? Do you have an insatiable need for groundbreaking speed? Well, consider this your green light to go & download Asphalt 8, fast!__HOT WHEELS and associated trademarks and trade dress are owned by, and used under license from, Mattel. ©2017 Mattel. descriptionHTML:
In Asphalt 8, you’ll race in some of the hottest, most high-performance dream machines ever created, from cars to bikes, taking them on a global tour of speed. From the blazing Nevada Desert to the tight turns of Tokyo, you’ll find a world of challenge, excitement & arcade fun on your road to the top!

REAL LUXURY DREAM CARS & MOTORCYCLES!
• Over 190 high-performance cars & bikes to drive & push beyond their limits.
• Top licensed manufacturers & models: the Lamborghini Veneno, Bugatti 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse, Ferrari LaFerrari, McLaren P1, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Ducati Monster 1200 & more, including a selection of racing motorbikes!
• Newly recorded high-fidelity motor sounds for realistic audio immersion.
• Customize & upgrade your rides with over 2,300 decals to take down opponents with style!

GET AIRBORNE WITH ASPHALT 8
• Hit the ramps & take the race beyond the limits of physics, breaking free from gravity into the sky with a car or bike!
• Perform barrel rolls & wild 360º jumps to soar past your opponents.
• Maneuver through the air, pulling off insane stunts in your car or motorcycle to maximize your speed & find a fast route to the goal.

EXOTIC NEW LOCATIONS
• Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!
• Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that’s sure to keep you on your toes.
• Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. Mastering them is sure to raise your game to the top of the competition!

AN ENDLESS STREAM OF CONTENT FOR SPEED FREAKS!
• 9 seasons & over 400 events in Career mode, with plenty of challenges for even the most experienced car & motorcycle riders.
• Stunning visuals thanks to next-gen shaders, real-time geometry reflection & other amazing HD effects.
• Check out the Infected & Gate Drift modes for a fresh twist on racing.
• Win top prizes in the Limited-Time Cups, including early access to some of the latest cars in the game!
• A detailed damage system.

THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE!
• Gear up for simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real players!
• Multiplayer Seasons & Leagues! Race your best against other players to score points & unlock prizes in limited-time Racing Seasons.
• Dare friends to asynchronous races as you chase your rivals’ ghost cars & bikes across the track.
• Compare scores on the new leaderboards with friends & rival riders around the world.
• Share your racing achievements & prove that you’re the ultimate speed machine.

MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL
• A heart-thumping mix of amazing music licensed for Asphalt 8 to drive your need for fast arcade racing.

CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION
• Rearrange your on-screen icons & controls however you like to customize & optimize your style of play.

So, are you ready for a real HD stunt-racing experience? Can you handle the Ferrari, Mercedes, or Audi of your dreams, among dozens of high-octane motorcycles? Do you have an insatiable need for groundbreaking speed? Well, consider this your green light to go & download Asphalt 8, fast!

comments: This is a really good game. I tend to be cynical about mobile games because they're usually pay to win these days but this game seems to have a very fair progression system. It's also refreshing that it's single player. That seems to be getting rare these days. My one suggestion is that there be more levels and things to do. I've only been playing for 4 days and I'm already nearing the end of the campaign. Add more missions or maybe another game mode and this game will easily earn 5 stars from me.

Great time passer! This is one of the better helicopter games I have played. The sound effects are realistic along with graphics and gameplay. No regrets or bad feelings from me. This game is on both phones and my tablet. Love it!

Fantastic game! It's by Gameloft so it's bound to be a good phone game. It's not unfair, but you do have to have some skill. It doesn't hold your hand but it's not hard to learn the controls. Despite the fact that you're also playing against people who are on their computers as well, it's definitely not unfair. One request: maybe add more options for your killstreaks. I would love to have my drone and turret on the same killstreak for my sniper class but I'm stuck with recon instead. Still love it tho :)

The weapons box also provide useless blueprints of the guns which turns into diamonds and i end up having lots of diamonds and very less credits which doesnt help getting a high end gun.

description: War has evolved, and so has the best online FPS on mobile! Step onto the battlefield and answer the call with the title that raised the bar for first person shooter games with its great graphics, high-powered guns and intense online multiplayer action. Create a squad from 9 classes, add your friends for team play and test your skills in dynamic warfare against online rivals from around the world!Prefer to work alone? Then feel free to step into the thrilling solo play campaign as you shoot your way through one dire situation after another to save the world as you launch an attack against a lunatic’s apocalyptic plans.You won’t find more first person shooter fun in a free game anywhere!9 CLASSES WITH UNIQUE SKILLS> Customize and level up any of the 9 classes across solo play and team play modes. > Find the playstyle that suits you: Assault, Heavy, Recon, Sniper, Support, Bounty Hunter, Sapper, X1-Morph, or Kommander.> Activate class-specific skills by earning and spending Skill Points.HIGH-POWERED ONLINE MULTIPLAYER > Watch players engaged in live online FPS battles and eSports competitions with all the great graphics you expect in the new Spectator mode.> Epic guns-a-blazing team play in Squad vs. Squad matches.> Talk to other players to plan your online multiplayer strategies and coordinate an attack in the Global and Squad Chats.> Top the individual and Squads leaderboards as you master your eSports skills.> Win free rewards and cool prizes in limited-time events.UNIFIED GAME PROGRESSION> Accumulate XP and level up by playing both solo play missions and team play matches.> Unlock higher-tier guns and other weapons by mastering lower-tier guns.> Customize the perfect weapon using a host of attachments and jump straight into the free game action.INTENSE SOLO PLAY CAMPAIGN > Engage in fast-paced story missions where the call will take you from Tokyo to Venice for a variety of first person shooter challenges.> Play the new Spec Ops missions for a real online FPS adrenaline rush.> Great graphics, music and voice performances perfectly adapted for a first person shooter game.HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS> Intuitive, highly customizable controls so you can play the game just the way you want.> Modern Combat 5 supports HID game controllers. MOGA Pro is also supported, in mode B (HID Mode).Modern Combat 5 requires an Internet connection.So if you’re ready for the online FPS of your dreams, dive into this unparalleled free game that takes online multiplayer to new heights. Perfect for anyone hungry for solo play first person shooter fun, or team play eSports competition._____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/FBMCGPTwitter: http://gmlft.co/twmcgpInstagram: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_IGYouTube: http://gmlft.co/ytmcgpForum: http://gmlft.co/MC5FRThis app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en/conditions-of-usePrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en/privacy-noticeEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en/eula
descriptionHTML:
War has evolved, and so has the best online FPS on mobile!

Step onto the battlefield and answer the call with the title that raised the bar for first person shooter games with its great graphics, high-powered guns and intense online multiplayer action. Create a squad from 9 classes, add your friends for team play and test your skills in dynamic warfare against online rivals from around the world!

Prefer to work alone? Then feel free to step into the thrilling solo play campaign as you shoot your way through one dire situation after another to save the world as you launch an attack against a lunatic’s apocalyptic plans.

You won’t find more first person shooter fun in a free game anywhere!

9 CLASSES WITH UNIQUE SKILLS
> Customize and level up any of the 9 classes across solo play and team play modes.
> Find the playstyle that suits you: Assault, Heavy, Recon, Sniper, Support, Bounty Hunter, Sapper, X1-Morph, or Kommander.
> Activate class-specific skills by earning and spending Skill Points.

HIGH-POWERED ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
> Watch players engaged in live online FPS battles and eSports competitions with all the great graphics you expect in the new Spectator mode.
> Epic guns-a-blazing team play in Squad vs. Squad matches.
> Talk to other players to plan your online multiplayer strategies and coordinate an attack in the Global and Squad Chats.
> Top the individual and Squads leaderboards as you master your eSports skills.
> Win free rewards and cool prizes in limited-time events.

UNIFIED GAME PROGRESSION
> Accumulate XP and level up by playing both solo play missions and team play matches.
> Unlock higher-tier guns and other weapons by mastering lower-tier guns.
> Customize the perfect weapon using a host of attachments and jump straight into the free game action.

INTENSE SOLO PLAY CAMPAIGN
> Engage in fast-paced story missions where the call will take you from Tokyo to Venice for a variety of first person shooter challenges.
> Play the new Spec Ops missions for a real online FPS adrenaline rush.
> Great graphics, music and voice performances perfectly adapted for a first person shooter game.

HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS
> Intuitive, highly customizable controls so you can play the game just the way you want.
> Modern Combat 5 supports HID game controllers. MOGA Pro is also supported, in mode B (HID Mode).

Modern Combat 5 requires an Internet connection.

So if you’re ready for the online FPS of your dreams, dive into this unparalleled free game that takes online multiplayer to new heights. Perfect for anyone hungry for solo play first person shooter fun, or team play eSports competition.

comments: I was not happy with the way the game ended. I paid 3.00 for the game because I thought it was interesting in the demo part, but the ending really sucked. I regret spending my money on this. There was no resolution to the ending. Did the Fox die, who was the man in the mask? It just seemed to cut off at the end. There should have been more to have a finality to the story. I want a refund. I pay for a lot of games and this is the first that made me regret it.

I love how intense it gets when Fred finds you but the controls are quite difficult, you could add control options to the game play. I am happy that they arent any add pop ups but the long ones you have to watch for hints are irritating. Overall great thrilling time consumer!!

Wayyyyy over priced to get 2 short chapters. Not worth the price. Maybe $0.99 would be the logical point for how short and simplistic it was. Had I known it was going to be finished in less than 20 mins of play, I would have skipped it.

great game! puzzles are very difficult, it really made me think.  i just hope all of the chapters are free. such a cliffhanger on the end of chapter 1  but if u have money. go buy all of the chapters, as for me.... uninstall coz i dont have the money 😅
The game is visually appealing, kinda surprised me that it was a mobile game. The chapter should at least be free, I don't mind the ads as long as the story persist
I love this game but this game have to make chapter 2 is free so player can enjoy this game and please add control options to the game play, pleassssseeee .

descriptionHTML:
Get Bomber Friends now and join the immensely hectic and fun online multiplayer game! Bomb your friends and be the last to survive to win the match!

- Campaign mode with over 300 levels! Find your way through 6 different worlds full of devious monsters!

- Different bombs to blast the enemies to smithereens.
- Includes google play achievements and leaderboards.
- Bomber Friends has universal game controller support!
- Supports Android TV!

Have fun!

Ok game but not a great game for the players, micro-transaction heavy and very little chances to complete the levels.

Really enjoy the game. Relaxing and addicting. However, i dont like the large amounts of lock chests taking up my camp space. I think the lock chests are too much of a push to get me to buy crystals. Chances of getting crystals seem slim and with the small amount of space available for other things, this is a down side for me. If i have to pay to open chests that i have been rewarded, why play? That might be  something that causes me to quit the game before too long.

When I first downloaded this game it was fun...now, all the dragons only have a stamina of 1 and now you need trophies to play levels. These trophies take f-o-r-e-v-e-r to accumulate. These things have made the game drag on way too long. And accomplishing any thing may also cost actual money now. I have read other reviews about the money system of this game and I will not be throwing my money down this drain.

Loved this game at the start. But since last update it has crashed on me several times. Today alone it has crashed on me 3 times. I lost all my camp progress each time and had to start again and of course each time is different because it is impossible to duplicate. Today I also lost my dragon gems and dragons I had created prior to crashes. There fore I lost my money spent. I also lost my daily chest which  contained 2 life trees and a super egg fragment.  I am very upset and dissatisfied now and regret spending money on this game that I loved prior to all the crashes.

Please remove The Challenges. The timer runs out too early on all of the challenges, all the way up to challenge 20. I have all the standard levels finished. I have been waiting for you to make new standard levels. The timer is cheating people in your challenges. There is no way they can be completed. I am not buying 50 gems to add 2 minutes. That's a waste of my money.

The game is great but customer service is non- existent. I bought the 30 day gem special that was supposed to come with an egg and fountain. Got the gems (so far)but not the extra items. Tried contacting customer support several times but following their M.O., they never respond.
description: Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching! In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:== Match Objects ==• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.== Tricky Puzzles ==• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
descriptionHTML:
Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching!

In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.

Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.

What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?

MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:

== Match Objects ==
• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.
• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!
• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!
• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!
• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!

== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==
• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!
• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.

== Tricky Puzzles ==
• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!
• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!
• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?
• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!

Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!

Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!

Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
developerAddress: 100 Cambridge Grove, The Aircraft Factory, London W6 0LE, United Kingdom
recentChanges: - NEW LEVELS! 11 New Levels in Cloud Land! This includes new cloud puzzles: find the right object to clear the clouds!
- Adjusted the Daily Chest to respawn after 23 hours instead of 24 hours, to help alleviate scheduling creep a bit.
- Added Turkish Language support
- Fixed the case where the camera could fly off in the opposite direction when panning, especially when playing in large levels or a bustling camp.
summary: Match everything in your world to create life and heal the land!
title: Merge Dragons!

comments: It's a nice game, with a great graphics and such but the auto-update for extra files it's kind of annoying. Is there anyway to turn it off? Because we have to waiting for it to be downloaded before can play again. Can we choose to update whenever we want?  Anyway, this is a really nice game and I've been playing it for a long time. Keep up the good work!

I love the game. There's nothing wrong with it because I feel like it's the old game that I grew up with. But what I hate is that the prices for packs, lp, sp and simoleons went high. The prices before was okay but now I don't think I will spend anymore for packs that give only like 5vip points. Such a fun game but aimes for large microtransactions.

I really enjoy this game, and love developing my Sim's homes and the world. Unfortunately, my game won't open. It hasn't for about a month now, even after this new update. It shows me the loading screen for five minutes, then crashes. It would be wonderful if there could be a fix for this.

Love love love it! This game is actually better than The Sims Mobile... 2 problems,, 1st. The Modern houses with second floor, so expensive😭! 2nd. The time it sometimes takes ages just for one activity!😐 but hey, everything else.. TOTALY AWSOME! 😍 thanks so much for creating this game. Cuz its so hard to download the sims 4 in a Mobile. 💕

This is actually cool and I really love this game. However, the expiration of most of the quest that i'm having are only 2 days to finish. I think it's unfair, and the materials needed are too expensive. Sims are busy on finishing tasks so they won't be able to go to work and earn. So I'm not totally enjoying the game.

When you get an event sometimes it only lasts for like 2 days which really isn't enough because some actions take 1 day. Please extend event times and don't give like 5 events at the same time. Also you should be able to log in other ways apart from Facebook because lots of people don't have Facebook. Please make other ways for us to login  so we can get more neighbours.

comments: It's such a good game. I've been playing this game for more than 2 years and it's still so good and addicting. But then I stoped playing after a year ago, 2018 it's now, I just remembered the game and started downloading and its still a great game!

Actually the game is really fantastic. The reason I gave it only 1 star is just to seek your attention because I wanted u all to add an effect of sound of engine as the car speeds up which will make the game really more realistic. I really loved playing this game but if u add that effect, it will make the game more interesting. I hope u add some more realistic effects in the game. Again I say that I gave it just 1 star to seek your attention, otherwise the game really worths a 5 star........Thank you.
Awesome game nvr ends playing... More and more i think u can change one thing destinatio  changing option on these plzz
The graphic looks basic but the game is addictive. Love that the wheel is on the right. It helps me learn how to park. If other cars could change lanes, it would be more challenging.
Whne started, could not exit the game. Also the driving simulator, does not gives the exact experience of driving, as the view is in the middle of the seat and not left or right.
I look love it!!!! It's kinda funny when the other people are being stupid and not backing up

comments: Really great gamplay, graphics, amazing controls which mind you are much more responsive than Sonic Dash or at least I think so, and this is the best concept I've ever seen. It's like Sonic Dash and a racing Sonic game had a baby. Best of all, this game captures the essence of Sonic in a brilliant way. Another thing I'd like to say is it's super balanced(besides Cream shes cheap as hell) but the fact is no character is better than the other cause they all have something unique about themselves.

The game is super choppy! I dont have a bad phone or Wi-Fi so I dont know the problem. If there was a mode like where you can reduce graphics that would be amazing. Besides that the rest is fine. Getting characters is easy, ads plays when after a match and/or if you want to double your rewards, and looks pretty nice.

I like it, really cool game, you never really know what's going to happen in a race. If you guys are making yet another character to race with, Im asking: can it please be Infinite, Big the 🐱, or our own custom character? Also, are you able to make different racing music in the game? I have a feeling that some people will get annoyed if the same "Lost Valley" song is being played over and over again.

I was enjoying the game but I started getting put against level 8's and 9's as a level 2.  Losing two races would take away 6 or 7  second place wins in a row, worth of progress.  I would lose 15-20 minutes worth of progress in two races. Wasting my time and effort.  Sometimes I swipe up to jump and my character just spin dashes instead, so my character just slams into an object or spins into a hole. Annoying.  After trying again and losing all gains in two losses, uninstalled.  Waste of time.

This game is really great and well polished. However, something needs to be done about the players with laggy connections. Most of the players with over 2000 points are all so laggy, that you can't tell where they are so you can't attack them. They are abusing the lag and need to be dealt with somehow.

Like the game but the latest update have mess up the gameplay with alot of lag. It keep sticking or kicking me out of the gameplay. Before the uodate. I had no issues and it was great. Please look into this

description: Be noted:Broken Screen is just a prank/simulated app used for fun, it simulates the broken screen effect to play with your friends. It will not harm your phone.Broken Screen Prank is a classic funny app used to prank your friends. When you touch your phone screen, the app simulates the cracked screen and loud cracking sounds on your phone. It looks like you use your finger to break and crack your phone. The broken effect is so realistic that all your friends will believe that your phone was broken and they will be scared.App Feature:✔ Realistic crack wallpaper and  breaking glass sound.✔ Crack your screen by touching or shaking.✔ Destroy your phone screen by other effects such as fire screen and electric screen.
descriptionHTML:
Be noted:
Broken Screen is just a prank/simulated app used for fun, it simulates the broken screen effect to play with your friends. It will not harm your phone.

Broken Screen Prank is a classic funny app used to prank your friends. When you touch your phone screen, the app simulates the cracked screen and loud cracking sounds on your phone. It looks like you use your finger to break and crack your phone. The broken effect is so realistic that all your friends will believe that your phone was broken and they will be scared.

App Feature:
✔ Realistic crack wallpaper and breaking glass sound.
✔ Crack your screen by touching or shaking.
✔ Destroy your phone screen by other effects such as fire screen and electric screen.
recentChanges: Enable to remove crack effect by click the notification;
Support Android SDK Version 25;
Improve user experience;
summary: (Prank App)Simulated cracked and broken screen to prank friends.
title: Broken Screen Prank

comments: Das Quiz bricht mitten drin ab und funktioniert nicht mehr, musste App schließen und habe Fragen verpasst da bei Quizduell alle drei Fragen ja auf einen Haufen kommen, was übrigens sehr nervtötend ist und mir nicht gerade Lust darauf mach es öfter zu spielen. Und im großen und ganzen hängt die App sowieso sehr oft. Dafür das ARD soviel Geld hat, sollte man meinen sie könnten eine wenigstens mehr oder minder funktionierende App erstellen lassen. Schlechteste Game App die ich je hatte. Hoffe nach den ganzen negativen Reviews wird daran irgendwann einmal was verbessert.
Live mitspielen funtioniert gar nicht

Bitte mehr Notifications, wenn man dran ist, bzw ne neue Frage kommt. Beim Duell kann man vor der Finalfrage nicht zurückgehen, um sich den Spielstand anzusehen, häufig bleibt die App auch hängen....  Finde die App grundsätzlich gut, aber es gibt noch viele Kleinigkeiten und technische Probleme.
Es werden keine Fragen eingeblendet, wieder gelöscht.

Die App reagiert sehr zeitverzögert, was noch das geringste Problem ist. Teilweise darf ich gar nicht mitraten, weil die Frage mir nicht gestellt wird, teilweise wird die Frage nicht Mal eine Sekunde lang eingeblendet und dann war sie wieder weg. Punkte werden mir erst gegeben wenn ich die App neustarte. Die 2 Sterne gibt es für die Idee und die Sendung. Die Umsetzung ist sehr schlecht, bitte überarbeiten!   Edit: die angesprochenen Fehler habe ich jetzt nicht mehr bemerkt. Dafür trat ein anderer auf: mir wurde die Frage gar nicht gestellt und sofort rot markiert und ich konnte nachgucken was die richtige Antwort war (ohne das die tv-show schon soweit gewesen wäre). Nachdem ich die richtige Antwort wusste, wurde mir die Frage dann doch gestellt und ich konnte antworten. Punkte habe ich dann auch bekommen

Die App ist im grossen und ganzen gut. Allerdings sind Fragen zum Teil einfach verschwunden, bevor man überhaupt die Antworten lesen konnte. Das ist sehr frustrierend besonders, wenn man die Arbeit weiss.
description: Die offizielle ARD Quiz-AppIn der offiziellen ARD Quiz App findest du ein breites Mitspielangebot zu den beliebten Quiz- und Showsendungen der ARD. Ganz neu ist das Modul zur Sendung „Quizduell“ im Vorabendprogramm des Ersten. Hier kannst du nicht nur live während der Show miträtseln, sondern mit deinen Antworten sogar das Studiogeschehen beeinflussen! Zusammen mit anderen App-Spielern bildest du nämlich das „Team Deutschland“. Gemeinsam mit dem Teamkapitän im Studio habt ihr die Möglichkeit, um den Tagessieg zu spielen. Neun App-Spieler erhalten bei  gewonnenem Spiel anschließend sogar einen Teil des Preisgeldes – ausgelost per Zufallsgenerator!Auch bei der „NDR Quizshow“ im Sonntagabend-Programm des NDR Fernsehens kannst du mit der ARD Quiz App dein Wissen rund um Norddeutschland live unter Beweis stellen. Vielleicht bist du ja sogar heller als die „Leuchte des Nordens“ im Studio?Auch wenn die beliebte Quizshow „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ im Vorabend-Programm des Ersten nicht gesendet wird, kannst du mit dem entsprechenden Modul in der ARD Quiz App weiter Dein Wissen unter Beweis stellen. Stell dich den kniffeligen Fragen und fordere deine Freunde oder andere App-Spieler zu einem Duell heraus! Natürlich kannst du auch im Spiel gegen die TV-Teams antreten und dich mit Bernhard Hoëcker und Elton messen.Bei den XXL-Ausgaben von „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ am Wochenende zur Prime Time im Ersten kannst du live mitzuspielen. Entscheidest du dich zu Beginn des Spiels für das richtige Gewinner-Team, kannst du mit etwas Glück sogar Geld gewinnen – und zwar den gleichen Betrag, den auch das Publikum im Studio erhält! Viel Spaß beim Mitraten in der ARD Quiz App!
descriptionHTML:
Die offizielle ARD Quiz-App

In der offiziellen ARD Quiz App findest du ein breites Mitspielangebot zu den beliebten Quiz- und Showsendungen der ARD.

Ganz neu ist das Modul zur Sendung „Quizduell“ im Vorabendprogramm des Ersten. Hier kannst du nicht nur live während der Show miträtseln, sondern mit deinen Antworten sogar das Studiogeschehen beeinflussen! Zusammen mit anderen App-Spielern bildest du nämlich das „Team Deutschland“. Gemeinsam mit dem Teamkapitän im Studio habt ihr die Möglichkeit, um den Tagessieg zu spielen. Neun App-Spieler erhalten bei gewonnenem Spiel anschließend sogar einen Teil des Preisgeldes – ausgelost per Zufallsgenerator!

Auch bei der „NDR Quizshow“ im Sonntagabend-Programm des NDR Fernsehens kannst du mit der ARD Quiz App dein Wissen rund um Norddeutschland live unter Beweis stellen. Vielleicht bist du ja sogar heller als die „Leuchte des Nordens“ im Studio?

Auch wenn die beliebte Quizshow „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ im Vorabend-Programm des Ersten nicht gesendet wird, kannst du mit dem entsprechenden Modul in der ARD Quiz App weiter Dein Wissen unter Beweis stellen. Stell dich den kniffeligen Fragen und fordere deine Freunde oder andere App-Spieler zu einem Duell heraus! Natürlich kannst du auch im Spiel gegen die TV-Teams antreten und dich mit Bernhard Hoëcker und Elton messen.

Bei den XXL-Ausgaben von „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ am Wochenende zur Prime Time im Ersten kannst du live mitzuspielen. Entscheidest du dich zu Beginn des Spiels für das richtige Gewinner-Team, kannst du mit etwas Glück sogar Geld gewinnen – und zwar den gleichen Betrag, den auch das Publikum im Studio erhält!

Viel Spaß beim Mitraten in der ARD Quiz App!
recentChanges: - Leistungsverbesserungen und Fehlerbehebungen
summary: Here you can find Mitspielangebote to quiz and show broadcasts on ARD
title: ARD Quiz

comments: I love to play hold em, but it's just to hard to round up the posse for poker night due to simply getting older. Life takes everyone n different directions. Not too mention, having kids and getting married, doing the family thing. Don't get me wrong, I absolutely love living the family life with my wife and kids but I will always miss poker night with the fellas. Now that I have stumbled upon WSOP I have been able to invite all of the fellas to join and we can all play together still once again. THANK U!!!!

Seen to many players leave because of this. Players with over a billion in chips. Goes to a small table with players having 30k or 40k. Goes all in every hand and kills the table. Players ask him why he does it and not play bigger tables. His answer because game allows me to and I can knock out player after player. Regulate players if they have X amount of chips play on bigger tables. Let the smaller players gain chips and enjoy the game.

It appears that I have reached a certain point where my free play is being met with bot resistance. I've gained over ten million in one day and lost it all and more in suck outs. This game is super fun whilst the going is good, but I fear the algorithms are programmed to entice you to pay real money, which of course you'd have to be mental to do once you realise how loaded this game is. Play for free = fun

Win a bit and loose everything in a few hands...  Once you win a good hand, leave the table.  Dealer will not give a a chance.  After this review, I received an e-mail from the designer assuring me, that game is fair.  I have been losing several hands with pocket KK, QQ, JJ, and so for.  So I stand with my original review.   Win on a good hand and leave game.  Or else you will lose it ALL!

This is a good game , only prob I have is there seems to some hackers/botting which makes it a little hard to play. Now as far as some people's comments even if the  people with a billion chips come to smaller tables , if you all knew how to play you wouldn't have to worry about them taking your chips. Trust me the majority of them started out at low tables also having to have to fight the ones with more money. I have been playing this game for a few years and love it.  Like I said only problem I have is to many bots/hackers.

I really enjoy this game .At first I just added it for one of the games on app like to gain points for gift cards.And of course to learn how to play poker. Now if their no points given for this game I would still play it. I totally enjoy this game , and the people that play it. Its truly an enjoyable game. description: Fleet Command is a naval warfare strategy game based on real life ships and military ranks, providing players a captivating experience of naval wars. Strengthen your power by managing and developing your base, producing resources, building ships, recruiting officers and more. Set sail to discover the vast riches of the sea in the world map. Mine resources, battle pirates and wage war against other players. Establish a Legion and lead your fellow players to glory in battle. With so many aspects to the game there is more to it than raw power, the right combination of officers, equipment and strategy can overcome a more powerful enemy.The game is very easy to start with and includes a tutorial of the basics, so even players with no experience of RTS or war games will learn very quickly. New functions and equipment are unlocked as your commander level increases, allowing players to learn the game at their own pace. With a vast support network, players can learn the more advanced features of the game and truly understand which path to take to victory.Features:Several ship classes of different types, all based on real life ships of the past and present ready for you to build or collect and command. Battle effects include explosions and missile trajectory so you can watch your fleet defeat your enemies.Flexible formations allowing you to choose which ships and officers you will use for each battle. This is a fantastic dynamic to the game, making thought, planning and strategy a critical component on the path to victory in this RTS game.Build resources in your base allowing you to improve resource output, build ships and develop new technology. If you are strong or cunning enough you can also loot resources from other players.A vast word map full of riches awaits you, but be careful, other players will seek to target your mining fleets, waiting for an opportune moment to destroy them and steal the resources they have collected.Great daily login rewards, free lottery draws and free plays at events help you build and develop an invincible fleet.[Fortune favours the bold] -Preparation is everything, have your ships ready to seize the moment when it arrives and take the resources you need from an enemy base or mine.[Pre-emptive Strike] - It might already be too late when you see hostile fleets on course for your base or fleet! Strike first and deal a crippling blow to your enemies before they strike against you. Fight for resource spots to mine to bring you more resources to develop your fleet. Recruit better officers and enhance equipment to make your fleets formidable in combat.[Domination] - Deploy your ships wisely and vary fleet formations to have maximum effect against your foe, weaken strong enemies and defeat weaker fleets to truly dominate the ocean! Learn the strengths and weaknesses of each ship class and put them in the best formation to deal devastating attacks on your enemies.For more information you can go to our Facebook page 'Fleet Command Community' (English): Fleet Command CommunityOr visit our forum: https://forum.movga.com/forumdisplay.php?fid=62Email: fc@movga.com
descriptionHTML:
Fleet Command is a naval warfare strategy game based on real life ships and military ranks, providing players a captivating experience of naval wars. Strengthen your power by managing and developing your base, producing resources, building ships, recruiting officers and more. Set sail to discover the vast riches of the sea in the world map. Mine resources, battle pirates and wage war against other players. Establish a Legion and lead your fellow players to glory in battle. With so many aspects to the game there is more to it than raw power, the right combination of officers, equipment and strategy can overcome a more powerful enemy.
The game is very easy to start with and includes a tutorial of the basics, so even players with no experience of RTS or war games will learn very quickly. New functions and equipment are unlocked as your commander level increases, allowing players to learn the game at their own pace. With a vast support network, players can learn the more advanced features of the game and truly understand which path to take to victory.
Features:
Several ship classes of different types, all based on real life ships of the past and present ready for you to build or collect and command. Battle effects include explosions and missile trajectory so you can watch your fleet defeat your enemies.
Flexible formations allowing you to choose which ships and officers you will use for each battle. This is a fantastic dynamic to the game, making thought, planning and strategy a critical component on the path to victory in this RTS game.
Build resources in your base allowing you to improve resource output, build ships and develop new technology. If you are strong or cunning enough you can also loot resources from other players.
A vast word map full of riches awaits you, but be careful, other players will seek to target your mining fleets, waiting for an opportune moment to destroy them and steal the resources they have collected.
Great daily login rewards, free lottery draws and free plays at events help you build and develop an invincible fleet.
[Fortune favours the bold] -Preparation is everything, have your ships ready to seize the moment when it arrives and take the resources you need from an enemy base or mine.
[Pre-emptive Strike] - It might already be too late when you see hostile fleets on course for your base or fleet! Strike first and deal a crippling blow to your enemies before they strike against you. Fight for resource spots to mine to bring you more resources to develop your fleet. Recruit better officers and enhance equipment to make your fleets formidable in combat.
[Domination] - Deploy your ships wisely and vary fleet formations to have maximum effect against your foe, weaken strong enemies and defeat weaker fleets to truly dominate the ocean! Learn the strengths and weaknesses of each ship class and put them in the best formation to deal devastating attacks on your enemies.

For more information you can go to our Facebook page 'Fleet Command Community' (English): Fleet Command Community
Or visit our forum: https://forum.movga.com/forumdisplay.php?fid=62
Email: fc@movga.com
developerAddress: HK

descriptionHTML:
- The defense game with over 11 million downloads is back with more advanced graphics and systems!
- Kill or be killed! It’s one or the other! It's the breathtaking confrontation for mankind's survival!
- Stay frosty! The tension never lets up as you move to the second half of the stage! Feel the intensity!
- Join the S.W.A.T. team and kill all the zombies. You must protect Perfectville, the last remaining safe zone.
- Shoot all the guns at an endless zombie horde! Use bombs too!
- A new defense game that offers FPS sniper mechanics with strong addictive authentic defense elements! Go and immerse yourself in this fun game!

■ Game Features ■
- Collect Weapons: Collect around 50 different types of weapons. Improve your FPS skills with them!

- Bizarre Zombies: Skateboarding, bowling, spear-wielding, fat, pink-wearing, and even dog zombies! Face all kinds of zombies!

- Challenge Hell Mode! Hell Mode Stages stimulate the desire to fight, but will be tough without upgrades! If you have the skills and confidence, try it!

- Challenge Infinite Mode! Eliminate endless zombies and challenge the world rankings! Save humanity with your friends.

- Experience our concept of a real-time battle mode! Compete with S.W.A.T. teams around the world! Check your skills through the real-time network battle!

- World Cleanup Day! Let's clean up constantly appearing zombies! Sweep away all the zombies that have conquered the planet with players around the world!

- Ultimate Weapon System: Drag your finger on the screen to target zombies with the best weapon, the sniper!

- Create the Strongest S.W.A.T. Team: You can make your S.W.A.T. more and more powerful with coins and stars.

- Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
- 4 Special Boosters help you get high score.

How to Play bubble game:
1.Tap where you want to pop bubble

This free bubble game is free to download and also good for family and kids. Bubbles Shooter game is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

comments: Ok so ive been olaying this game for a long time now, but I had to delete the game for storage purposes. Once I game back I logged in with my facebook account and all that but nothing loads. Which is fine I just have to wait. But now my issue is that the actual levels for the wedding event, and the normal quest, it kicks me out of the app and it does thatt every time. Please fix this issue. Maybe then Ill give it five stars.

Great addictive game! Starts out cute and innocent. Recently found out through a spoiler thread that it does take a darker turn in Ch 15. The U.S. servers are currently only on Ch 12. Still a great addicting game that many players start out thinking "Awesome! A great game that I don't I can have the option to play for free!" Soon they cave when that ONE outfit comes along that they HAVE TO HAVE lol.

I love this game! It's really good for creative people who like to design their own outfits. I just downloaded on my new phone and started over (I don't have Facebook to link my progress with). Please make it available to link with Google play so I don't always lose progress!   Also, since downloading again, I found that some of the names are different... I was very confused, since the voice over still says the old names. I like Yoko way better than Bobo!!

I loved this game, and am V8. So its not like I am against paying. I am against the ranking event especially since you devs LIED TO YOUR PLAYERS and said we wont be getting one again. We will not pay 100s for a non guarenteed reward. It would be more HONEST, if you set up the suits as 300 USD each recharge.  If you are smart at all, devs you should understand that business ethics is just as important as profit and will benefit everyone in the long run.

Lovely game! Gorgeous clothes and gameplay. A little cheesy in. The story but fairly creative for a dress up game. Plus it can be hilarious with how wild the lore gets around fashion. Design can be a little overcrowded sometimes but everything is coordinated so it still looks nice. Backgrounds are gorgeously painted. Tutorial is easy to understand but isnt too tedious. I am officially addicted

I never write reviews, but this game deserves all the praise possible. Downloaded it for my niece and turns out I am the one addicted!! I'm a daily player now and love the fact that you can start your own group for 300 gems and approve applications and interact with your stylist association members. That aspect took the game to a whole new level. The clothing is beautiful and the attention to detail is great!!! Give it a shot and you just may become addicted like myself. I do spend around 20 bucks a week, but it was just as much fun before I was spending money, I just wanted the special clothes for events.
description: ACHIEVEMENTS1. Recommended by Google Play in many countries    2. More than 50 million players world-wideALSO FEATURES  Designed focusing on dressing up, with high image quality and interesting game-play.  Bringing stereoscopic gaming experience to you.                Interesting story-lineThe protagonist Nikki will embark on a magical journey across seven nations with different designing styles, and develop various stories with designers and stylists from these seven countries. With nearly 300,000 words'dialogues and descriptions, the plot is comparable to that of a novel!                                          Tens of thousands gorgeous outfitsDaily fashion, European style, antique beauty, dream-like fairy tales, neutral handsome, futuristic sci-fi…Almost all dressing styles are covered. Players can collect new outfits and enrich their own closets by completing in-game tasks every day. Supported by a fantastic artists' team, we consistently add new outfits on a monthly basis, making sure that the game keeps up with new trends.                                                                             Hundreds of different styles for free designIn our free design mode, players can freely style and design outfits, hairstyles, makeup, accessories and even change the backgrounds and layouts based on their own preferences.   Personally tailoredBy collecting different colored dyes, players can freely change the color of their clothing.                                                                            By collecting outfits patterns and decomposing redundant outfits, players can personally customize clothes and upgrade simple clothing into more elegant and fashionable outfits.Designer dress up battlePlayers can compete and battle against designers from all over the world under different dress up themes.                                   More than ten different 'abilities' can be used in dress up battles. Use your 'abilities' at the right moment to turn the tide!                                                            Playing with your friendsPlayers can play the game with their Facebook friends.                                                                            You can also make new friends by joining in various in-game activities. Facebook Fan-pageFollow us - Love Nikki - on Facebook and you can regularly receive free game benefits. There're also many interesting online and offline activities on a daily basis waiting for your participation.Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LoveNikkiGameOur Service mailbox: cs1nikkigame@gmail.com

The protagonist Nikki will embark on a magical journey across seven nations with different designing styles, and develop various stories with designers and stylists from these seven countries. With nearly 300,000 words'dialogues and descriptions, the plot is comparable to that of a novel!

Tens of thousands gorgeous outfits
Daily fashion, European style, antique beauty, dream-like fairy tales, neutral handsome, futuristic sci-fi…Almost all dressing styles are covered. Players can collect new outfits and enrich their own closets by completing in-game tasks every day. Supported by a fantastic artists' team, we consistently add new outfits on a monthly basis, making sure that the game keeps up with new trends.

Hundreds of different styles for free design
In our free design mode, players can freely style and design outfits, hairstyles, makeup, accessories and even change the backgrounds and layouts based on their own preferences.

Personally tailored
By collecting different colored dyes, players can freely change the color of their clothing. By collecting outfits patterns and decomposing redundant outfits, players can personally customize clothes and upgrade simple clothing into more elegant and fashionable outfits.

Designer dress up battle
Players can compete and battle against designers from all over the world under different dress up themes.
More than ten different 'abilities' can be used in dress up battles. Use your 'abilities' at the right moment to turn the tide!

Playing with your friends
Players can play the game with their Facebook friends. You can also make new friends by joining in various in-game activities.

Facebook Fan-page
Follow us - Love Nikki - on Facebook and you can regularly receive free game benefits. There're also many interesting online and offline activities on a daily basis waiting for your participation.

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LoveNikkiGame
Our Service mailbox: cs1nikkigame@gmail.com

summary: Countless exquisite outfits for you to mix and match at will !
title: Love Nikki-Dress UP Queen

comments: Love playing but have 2 suggestions. We need another mill.  When we have large orders to fill it takes forever to complete those orders because the mull is tied up all the time. Maybe every 40 levels add a mill purchase option. When selling on the market, we need an option for a blind add or a neighborhood only sell or trade.. make these upgrades and so far game would be perfect!

It's great to be able to buy from other farms in theory. But there are WAY too many times that you click on something and it's either sold or not even in the roadside stand at all. The for sale paper needs to update quicker.  Also, it's very hard to accumulate any 'west bucks' in this game and you need them to do almost anything, so the game is a big money suck too. I'm deleting it.

I love these type of games just like hayday. I have noticed it freezes and takes ages to load the newspaper. Also would be helpful if it could tell you who needs help in the newspaper would help filling orders quicker. Also I have noticed alot of people selling the same parts and harder to get others and it's extremely rare to get the land parts without paying

The game doesnt give enough case vs things to buy or fix.  Also have issues with getting product into the alloted spaces.  I thought it was my screen but had it cleaned thoroughly and it still happens.  It takes several attempts!!!  The story is cute.  The graphics are cute as well.  Ive noticed it has a couple of choices from other games Ive played on older phones. I would suggest the game to others but get the issues fixed and itll be a 5star game.

I love playing these games. I'm not sure why we are rating gameplay they offer apps not a game. It's crazy how they ask us to rate game at the beginning of game. We haven't learned the bad points. This game makes us pay for treasure chest instead of giving us to them free like most games. Which means we have to pay for everything. Totally not fair. Takes the fun out of game.

The game itself is fabulous. Cute farm. Good graphics. Good work on that front. Yet being a bit more generous with westbucks in game or making some things more payable with your coins. I get that games don't create themself. But I personally am more likely to pay for games you can actually play for a bit after doing a purchase. And I don't really get that feeling here. But none the less the game itself is a work of art 😊

Second if u have money in millions, the cost of the parts are also in million and so on, and even having millions of dollars in the game u might fail to upgrade vehicle sometimes  that makes no sense.

I can't just enjoy it and play a bit then carry on playing a bit later.. please fix this I really enjoy.this game and its getting ruined a bit for me...
