comments: I wrote a review already for my game on my laptop,and as I said I love this game but for some addicting reason I now have a new game on my new tablet I just got hehe. I am not here to complain and I'm not saying anyone else is in just wanted to let you know that some of the ads don't show up on the tablets you can hear them play but can't see them and as I said (some). I have managed my way around it through memorizing where the close (x) is just from trying to tap every corner but I would like not to have to do that hehe. But like I said I can manage, it's just that I know someone who would like to play but can't really stand that lol my mom hehe anyway I just thought about it would be nice if she could play too and it might help as well. Thanks for reading and listening and have yourselves  a nice day and night. Plus thanks for this game!

I love this game! So much,very addictive and very unique!  I would rate 100 stars if I could!You can battle, feed dragons, do clans...ECT ! Every update it gets new things!  Best dragon game ever!You would love this game, just get it! And it's free!There are so many islands too! You can connect it on Google play to save the game or Facebook! The dragons are so cute!!! Please get this game! There are so many activities  And tournaments!

I love this game so much but... I used to play this game a year ago then I got tired of it then I returned yesterday  I had a Facebook account that even has a legendary called Ice cream , so I signed in back half of my dragons are gone , my farms , my island everything that's why I rated 1 if I could get my account back I would rate 5 Thanks. Sincerely,  A Google Player ( Facebook too ).

I love this game because is it active! I can play it all day and not get board! Keep up the great work everyone!😛😛 ( there a lot of ads every 5 minutes though. I don't know why. Pls fix that and the game will be even better! Respond to me as soon as you can! Thanks you for your time to listen to my opinion!

There is an unnecessary amount of ads. I understand representing your sponsors, but at what cost to your customers? General game play is also very challenging for new players  as far as leveling up dragons, collecting coins/food, and even breeding times are ridiculous.

Not for those who want a almost free game.  Of course the developers need to make money, but I think this game goes overboard.  In order to advance in the game at a rate that keeps you interested, you must pay.  Not very balanced.

comments: This game has issues. The tutorial has a white background with white crosshairs making it nearly impossible to aim. Other times I'd die in the first second of play after being hit 1 time but it would take me at least 3 hits to kill my opponent. Watched a video for a free crate and then the game went back to the startup screen like it was rebooting and i had to watch another to open it. Not very much to do either. Im out.
Matchmaking is terrible i played the same person 5 times in a row and the fact it doesnt match anywhere close to rank i was 68 and another was in the 1000s
It's ok it lags bad an there it's only 1 way to play so that sucks but it's ok. Noobs will get beat a lot do to no ranks  so new can play a pro
Full of hackers, hard to aim, low earnings and retarded physics. Make the game better then launch it.
This game is awesome 👏✊👍 very fun and a lot of bad people on here so it's easy to win.
It's really hard, I wish the different knives changed the range, or you could pick a new character to do that

descriptionHTML:
Wie würden Sie sich als Kandidat bei „Wer wird Millionär?“ schlagen? Mit der offiziellen Trainingslager-App zu Deutschlands beliebtester Quizshow können Sie jetzt Ihr Allgemeinwissen testen!

▶ Mit 15 Fragen zum Punkte-Millionär
Das Quiz folgt dem gleichen Spielprinzip wie die RTL-Show mit Günther Jauch: Meistern Sie zuerst eine Sortieraufgabe, um es auf den WWM-Kandidatenstuhl zu schaffen. Dann warten auch schon 15 knifflige Fragen mit je vier Antwortmöglichkeiten auf Sie. Können Sie alle Fragen richtig beantworten und sich die Million schnappen?

▶ 40.000 Original-Fragen
Beweisen Sie Ihr Wissen bei aktuellen WWM-Fragen oder lassen Sie sich auf ein zufälliges Spiel ein – Sie haben die Wahl. Oder möchten Sie mal eine Rätsel-Runde aus einem der Prominenten-Specials nachspielen? Kein Problem! Nach jeder Show wird die App um brandneue Fragen erweitert. Bei insgesamt über 40.000 Original-Fragen aus „Wer wird Millionär?“ wird Ihnen nie langweilig – egal, wie oft Sie spielen.

▶ Alle Joker & Risikovariante
Natürlich können Sie bei jedem Spiel den 50:50-Joker, den Publikumsjoker und den Telefonjoker zur Hilfe nehmen. Wollen Sie mit Zusatzjoker spielen? Dann wählen Sie die Risikovariante aus. Doch Vorsicht: So verzichten Sie auf die Sicherheitsstufe bei 16.000 Punkten und müssen sich bei einer falschen Antwort mit 500 Punkten zufriedengeben.

▷ Sind Sie bereit für spannende Quiz-Runden? Holen Sie sich jetzt die kostenlose „Wer wird Millionär?“-App und los geht’s! ◁

Bei Feedback zur App freuen wir uns über Ihre Nachricht über unser Kontaktformular: https://www.rtl.de/kontakt

comments: My favorite puzzle/physics app. After I reached my goal of 3 stars on all the levels, I was sad my conquest was over. Then I discovered a whole other area of the app that consists of user created levels to solve. Now I've got new puzzles everyday thanks to the active fans in the brain-it-on community and I submit my own levels on occasion by using the level editor. If you like solving puzzles this is a great way to escape for awhile and exercise your brain at the same time.

I introduced this game to my 8 year old and my husband. We are all hooked! I am fascinated by the concept and simple yet brilliant design. The forced 30 second ads that another reviewer mentioned are only if you want a hint. The between-round ads are short and intermittent.

this game is so simple but yet so challenging. some levels seem impossible but the great thing is you can still advance as long as you have enough points. very well done. hats off to the designer. the physics are coded perfect as well for gravity friction inertia and sometimes extra bounce..  love it. can only handle it in bursts of play because it works your brain so intensely. havent used the hints either though. if you dont keep coming back to play this then you probably arent a very interesting person and spend too much time diddling your privates

I'm surprised this game scores so well. It's an exercise in drawing/scribbling, not physics. The puzzles are very one dimensional and most of them are solved by trial and error over thought and skill. It's a novel idea but given what else is available out there I wouldn't pay a penny for this game as it lacks innovation, originality and just feels very dated.

LOVE this game!! Literally, I don't think I can explain it. Just play it, and see for yourself :D    If you like figuring stuff & puzzles out, this is totally for you! And also, it's just so satisfying to watch. I personally play lots of the puzzles over & over again, just to see the graphics, how all the objects fly and move 😜

A good sign of high intelligence would be to not pay for this.   On a tablet with a pen,  this probably works a little better but on a phone with 1 minute ads,   it's really frustrating.   Basically,  you find a solution and have to repeat it 30 times until the dull and unrealistic physics of this program finally accept it.
description: Deceptively challenging physics puzzles for your brain!Draw shapes to solve challenging physics puzzles. They're not as easy as they look. Care to give one a try?◆ Dozens of brain busting physics puzzles, with more being added all the time◆ Compete with your friends for the Brain It On! crown◆ Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?◆ Share your unique solutions and compare with your friendsAll the levels can be unlocked for free by earning stars in previous levels. You can always find dozens of new player created free levels each day on the community screen. You can also purchase the game to remove all ads, unlock all hints, unlock levels early, and unlock the level editor.Please note: purchasing the "No Popup Ads" option just removes the ads between levels, purchasing the "Full Game" will also remove the ads to get hints.If you like this game, please rate it and leave a comment. As an indie developer your support is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your help! If you don't like something in the game, please email me at support@brainitongame.com and tell me why. I want to hear your feedback and comments so I can continue to make this game better.You can find me on Twitter at @orbitalnine, see the latest news on the Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/brainitongame, or get all the details on the website: http://brainitongame.comI hope you enjoy Brain It On!
descriptionHTML:
Deceptively challenging physics puzzles for your brain!

Draw shapes to solve challenging physics puzzles. They're not as easy as they look. Care to give one a try?

◆ Dozens of brain busting physics puzzles, with more being added all the time
◆ Compete with your friends for the Brain It On! crown
◆ Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution?
◆ Share your unique solutions and compare with your friends

All the levels can be unlocked for free by earning stars in previous levels. You can always find dozens of new player created free levels each day on the community screen. You can also purchase the game to remove all ads, unlock all hints, unlock levels early, and unlock the level editor.

Please note: purchasing the "No Popup Ads" option just removes the ads between levels, purchasing the "Full Game" will also remove the ads to get hints.

If you like this game, please rate it and leave a comment. As an indie developer your support is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your help! If you don't like something in the game, please email me at support@brainitongame.com and tell me why. I want to hear your feedback and comments so I can continue to make this game better.

You can find me on Twitter at @orbitalnine, see the latest news on the Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/brainitongame, or get all the details on the website: http://brainitongame.com

I hope you enjoy Brain It On!

comments: Your bonuses are a joke. Hints cost way too much. You use obsolete words so we have to use up our coins. I know you won't respond. You never do. The game is fun. It's you guys that suck.
The ads sit at the bottom of the screen, covering up some of the letters. The first levels are too simple. This is not for someone who has a command of the English language over the age of 8

A fun game to play to pass time. Not too challenging but every once and awhile it does make you think. The only think I don't like is when you find a word that they won't count for points. Other than that no complaints.

Not bad. Uses some pretty obscure words and doesn't give you bonus for a lot of what should be bonus words. Hard to earn coins because of this as you earn very few from solving the puzzles. Clues are expensive for the reason. TIP!  TURN OFF YOUR WIFI WHILE PLAYING AND YOU CAN AVOID THE CONSTANT ADS.

Was having fun til I tried to listen to music with pandoras player while playing the game. Uninstalling bc playing the game pauses the music, and the sounds in this game are absolutely not interesting. I didn't even mind the ads since it's a free game.

Two things which needs to be corrected. If the game is played in silent mode then ads should also be silent. Second, it is not possible to check the meaning of the last word because the level ends as soon as you discover the last word.

You were not born as a hero, but now it’s time to become one.

• Action-packed 3D FPS with elements of RPG.

Waking up in the hood, remembering nothing and locked in a super soldier suit. Who are you? What would you do?
You will have to complete the main storyline to find out who you are.

GAMEPLAY
Explore the crime city, full of gangs and aggressive fractions. Become citizen hope as a standard of pure law and justice, or come to the city as a new doom knight.
• More than 10 different quest lines.
• Fraction quests and rewards. Your gameplay will differ depending on your choice and game style.
• Enlarging money rewards with quest line progress, allowing you to unlock more advanced weaponry in the shop.

COMBAT
Try to avoid hassle with your superhero mobility or overthrow both heaven and hell on your enemy heads. Vary your melee and ranged combat with new abilities and weaponry.
• Advanced rope dynamics, now it’s also your deadly endless weapon.
• Super kick!
• 7 new explosive and energy guns!
TRANSPORT
Military tank, heavy loaded helicopter, supercars, limousines, sport coupes, cross bikes, Harleys and much more.
• More than 20 different vehicles with own velocity and features.

PROGRESS
Master all the abilities and become the unstoppable flying havoc.
• Level-up upgrades for your abilities and skills.
• In-game tutorial leading you through all the new functional.

Entertaining adventures of rope hero in Vice Town. Determine the fate of the whole city with the super soldier powers.

Play the true game of war on the streets.

Find out the truth about main hero past.
ENJOY hours of FUN and entertaining gameplay.

comments: Hey RobTop, the game is ok, but there is one issue. im used to playing geometry dash with my samsung chromebook 3 (it doesn't have touchscreen) and when i press the spacebar on my computer (this is the same issue on geometry dash lite and subzero) it doesn't let me jump. This game stress me out but the next day when I play it I beat the lv in one go and fills my heart up with joy! So what if the control's are sensitive? I know they are.. but if you take a day and give it another go you know what happens and you do great!

If you are looking for a fun game, this is not one of 'em. It is so annoying. It gets me is mad that I've DELETED it twice. But... when you win the levels you feel like you have just met Jesus. Also, the first few levels are easy.

I love this game just...can you fix one glitch? On the final level final area the wave is bugged ...when I tap it goes down by itself! Can you please fix it? I was trying over 3 hours to make it but I can' t because of the glitch :( Please fix it.

comments: Excellent card game.  However as soon as you get passed reasonably priced starter packs you cannot play the game and why not?  Because you play two games then you need to spend huge amounts of money so you can play two more rounds.  Then you need good cards and guess what you have to buy them through a lottery system like gambling highly addictive but after maybe thousands of dollars you get the card you want guess what you need to evolve your card and guess what you need to buy your reagents big dough yet again.  Then when you have spent all your hard earned cash you need to buy special weapons to give yourself a good boost to your cards.  Do you get where this game and a right game it is too. It relies on you getting addicted so you spend all your time and resources on an endless quest for something you will never have uninstalled buy buy.

Amazing game, honestly, top 3 mobile game I've ever played, found an amazing guild and it's loads of fun. No paywall is the crowning achievement in my opinion. One thing, cause I don't know where customer support is, I started a Path of Champion level, and  on the first wave the game crashed and when I logged back on I had no key and didn't have a chance to beat the level

Definitely pay to win. When you scroll up or down it thinks you are clicking on something. Stamina is a nightmare as when you reach a high enough level that takes more xp to level up, you can't play for hours as it takes to long to recharge. Should make gems easier to get for non paying players so it is more fair. Other than that pretty good.

Number one of the best games I have ever played on my phone. I'm watching ads for bonus experience when sacrificing my cards. And I love the fact of that availability. Especially since it pays them which increases chances of more games like this one. Keep up the great work. Really helping my cognitive development of pattern recognition

Great games. Controls suck.  You want to scroll and click a card instead (i know how to swipe) turns are fast paced..sometimes too fast. And as a starter...some of the turn challenges seem a bit unrealistic with the characters provided. Almost like they want to have you spend money off rip. Good game overall....but some things should definitely need work.

It's a lot other games of this type. I haven't been able to find a problem with it yet. Great graphics although the timer is a bit fast when you're looking up connections. If you had a button that the players would push when they couldn't find any more connections, that would be great!

description: Get in the car and start your lessons in the most realistic city driving simulator. This game will test your driving skills and it will need your full attention to traffic rules. You have to watch for traffic and pedestrians, stop signs, traffic lights, speed and much more. If you are looking for a real driving experience, Driving School 3D is the game for you.You will learn how to drive a manual transmission vehicles or stick to the classic automatic gearbox. You can pick a simulation in a large open city, country town and open highway. After passing individual levels, you will enter the final exam. On each map and level you will collect points and unlock many different vehicles. In addition to career driving mode, you can also compete with your friends by inviting them to online challenges.UNIQUE SPORT CARSIf you drive carefully and without mistakes, you collect points and unlock different vehicles such as sport sedan or racing car.REALISTIC TRAFFICCity streets can sometimes have heavy traffic so you will have to watch for other vehicles and pedestrians. Driving on a highway can be even more difficult if you are fast so be careful.ONLINE CHALLENGEChallenge your friends in online mode. You drive on a selected map and you have to obey the rules. This way you collect points and when you both arrive to the target parking lot, the better driver wins.GAME FEATURES+ multiplayer mode to race with players around the world+ sport and SUV vehicles to unlock+ more than 50 levels on 3 maps+ smooth car handling and realistic physics+ manual transmission with clutch+ switch cameras on vehicle
descriptionHTML:
Get in the car and start your lessons in the most realistic city driving simulator. This game will test your driving skills and it will need your full attention to traffic rules. You have to watch for traffic and pedestrians, stop signs, traffic lights, speed and much more. If you are looking for a real driving experience, Driving School 3D is the game for you.

You will learn how to drive a manual transmission vehicles or stick to the classic automatic gearbox. You can pick a simulation in a large open city, country town and open highway. After passing individual levels, you will enter the final exam. On each map and level you will collect points and unlock many different vehicles. In addition to career driving mode, you can also compete with your friends by inviting them to online challenges.

UNIQUE SPORT CARS
If you drive carefully and without mistakes, you collect points and unlock different vehicles such as sport sedan or racing car.

REALISTIC TRAFFIC
City streets can sometimes have heavy traffic so you will have to watch for other vehicles and pedestrians. Driving on a highway can be even more difficult if you are fast so be careful.

ONLINE CHALLENGE
Challenge your friends in online mode. You drive on a selected map and you have to obey the rules. This way you collect points and when you both arrive to the target parking lot, the better driver wins.

GAME FEATURES
+ multiplayer mode to race with players around the world
+ sport and SUV vehicles to unlock
+ more than 50 levels on 3 maps
+ smooth car handling and realistic physics
+ manual transmission with clutch
+ switch cameras on vehicle
developerAddress: Zarovnica, Croatia
recentChanges: + bug fixes
summary: How fast can you get a driver's licence?
title: Driving School 3D

comments: Hey... I would give this game 5 stars but there is 1 main -VE POINT. FUEL takes TOOOOOOOO LONG TO RECHARGE.  The point of this game is to playyyyyy the game. I don't want to keep waiting. I downloaded your great game TO PLAY it. Please try to solve this issue. I will definitely give you 5 stars if you fix this. Please listen to us and read our comments. Most of us are mentioning this 1 -ve point. Thank you

Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

Really good idea let down massively by the developers. Progress is extremely slow due to fuel taking so long to recharge and having to use gems to buy new vehicles. So unless you want to spend all your money on a free game, it doesn't really feel like you're getting anywhere.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

It shouldn't be easier to level up rather than actually playing game. I wouldn't say that the gameplay is difficult to play, but the purposefully placed trucks that shoot you is a bit ridiculous. Other cars are in the way which ultimately eliminates you before you can attack the shooting trucks. There really is no challenge except trying to beat your previous score. I give this game an eh out eh.

description: Run your own Horse HotelHorseHotel makes you the owner of your own horse ranch. Take care of the horses, look after their needs, and discover exciting games, until they return to their owners happy. You are responsible for their health and well-being. There is enough space on your green pastures for up to six horses. Each horse has to be examined in order to see if it’s healthy. Feed them, nurse them, and play with them. Make sure they have everything they need before they go back to their owners.Exciting horse games and challengesThere are six different horse breeds waiting for you, and each breed has its own individual needs. Take a look at the horse’s file to find out what exactly the horse needs. This will help you to provide the best care for the horse. If your horse needs more endurance play the obstacle course minigame. If the horse is lacking in confidence, you can build it up with flatwork exercises in the riding arena. To increase its ability, just play the dressage minigame. But one thing all horses have in common: they need your affection, so don’t neglect to give them treats and pet them!Expand your hotel to take in more guestsTo turn your horse ranch into a luxurious hotel, you will find lots of expansions in the shop which will create more space for more horses. But bear in mind that the bigger your hotel gets, the more demanding your guests will become. Earn more coins by completing missions so you can afford to improve your hotel and take care of more and more horses. Besides maintaining your hotel, caring for your horses is the order of the day: clean out their stables everyday so all the horses enjoy a comfortable stay with you!❀ Run your own hotel for horses and turn it into a luxurious hotel❀ Discover exciting minigames❀ Feed and take care of up to six different breeds of horse❀ Collect coins, complete quests, and spin the wheel of fortuneVisit us on Facebook: facebook.com/tivolamobile
descriptionHTML:
Run your own Horse Hotel
HorseHotel makes you the owner of your own horse ranch. Take care of the horses, look after their needs, and discover exciting games, until they return to their owners happy. You are responsible for their health and well-being. There is enough space on your green pastures for up to six horses. Each horse has to be examined in order to see if it’s healthy. Feed them, nurse them, and play with them. Make sure they have everything they need before they go back to their owners.

Exciting horse games and challenges
There are six different horse breeds waiting for you, and each breed has its own individual needs. Take a look at the horse’s file to find out what exactly the horse needs. This will help you to provide the best care for the horse. If your horse needs more endurance play the obstacle course minigame. If the horse is lacking in confidence, you can build it up with flatwork exercises in the riding arena. To increase its ability, just play the dressage minigame. But one thing all horses have in common: they need your affection, so don’t neglect to give them treats and pet them!

Expand your hotel to take in more guests
To turn your horse ranch into a luxurious hotel, you will find lots of expansions in the shop which will create more space for more horses. But bear in mind that the bigger your hotel gets, the more demanding your guests will become. Earn more coins by completing missions so you can afford to improve your hotel and take care of more and more horses. Besides maintaining your hotel, caring for your horses is the order of the day: clean out their stables everyday so all the horses enjoy a comfortable stay with you!

❀ Run your own hotel for horses and turn it into a luxurious hotel
❀ Discover exciting minigames
❀ Feed and take care of up to six different breeds of horse
❀ Collect coins, complete quests, and spin the wheel of fortune

Visit us on Facebook: facebook.com/tivolamobile

comments: Lots of fun. Unfortunately, the other day I had to do a factory reset on my phone. When I installed Design Home afterwards, all of my designs, progress...all of the money I've spent on the game for over a year was/ is gone. It created a totally different designer number (profile) for me. It wasn't connected to my Facebook for privacy reasons, but now? I don't know if I can keep playing, if I have to start all the way over. If you want to play, you'd better link it to Facebook.

This is an awesome game.  Especially since I love decorating.   Few things though,  how about pillows on the plain sofas, modern pictures for modern furniture,  traditional scones, etc, for traditional designs, and more diamonds or stop using extra sofas and expenses that take away our diamonds. We need more accessories for the tables like books, vases, and flowers, also how about some better pictures because your choices are by far not worth $1000.00.  Last but not least, more colors in furniture with two or three toned designs.  That's what designers look for.  Thank you! Still love the game.

The game is addictive. I wish that we could see who we are up against in the voting to better understand the rating we receive. It would be great if we had the chance to buy limited accessories 1 more time. I love the new challenges that we have received in the last few weeks. I've noticed every time you make an update that I have lost some furniture why? I do not like that you have increased the dollar value of buying the highest amount of gems. I won't buy again. Losing intrerest real fast.   Thanks again.

I still love this game! However I have yet to change my mind about the fact that it takes longer to vote just for 3 stars at a time, than to actually design the max of 5 designs per day. Can you not increase stars won per vote? Can you not make designs brief even more compulsory as many designers dont follow the brief and you just end up losing votes because your design is too colourful or eclectic

I super loved this game and I am glad tapjoy is back.  I just have an issue lately.  I completed an offer lately but never got rewarded.  It says it might take 24 hours for the submit button to appear so I can contact customer support but it's been 3 days now and it still says pending.  I have no other way to report it.  Please look into this. Voting is an issue but it's the players who are voting and they vote for whatever they think has a better design no matter if they follow the requirements, you can only use a furniture for a limited time and will have to purchase it again if you want it.  I understand those things but I hope the reward for every design completed is higher than 500 so we''ll have more to spend and make the furniture more affordable.  Otherwise, this app is one of the best!

I love this game concept. I also like the "borrow" option but I don't have anyone to borrow from because everyone I know stops playing because it's too difficult to advance (achieve 5 stars, which is the quickest and nearly impossible way to do so. Impossible because your advancement is based on user preference). A "sort by price" filter would also be cool for those of us who enjoy this game but are on a limited budget.
description: Love home decorating? Play Design Home today - a relaxing, fun game that allows you to live the life of an interior decorator. Sharpen your decorating skills in daily Design Challenges and style visually stunning three-dimensional spaces with access to real, high-end furniture and decor brands. It’s quick, it’s fun and you can connect with a vibrant creative community while learning about diverse décor styles - thus improving your design skills and gaining inspiration that you can even apply in your real life.* Relax through play and express your creativity in daily Design Challenges.* Unlock rewards as you polish your amazing abilities as an interior decorator.* Play with real life, high-end brands as you learn about different interior design styles.* Vote on your favorite rooms from a vibrant, creative community.* Share your creativity and borrow furnishings from your friends when you connect to Facebook.Love the items in your favorite room? You can shop for them directly through Design Home! Click any piece you love and buy it for your own home. With new pieces added every day, Design Home literally puts the best home décor (alternative: furnishings) directly at your fingertips. Not only can you discover brands and trends, you can own them, too!

comments: I think this game has potential. The gameplay is fun and so far I enjoyed the pvp battle. I gave a 4 star because the game lacks variety in the early levels - I don't feel myself making any progress after playing for two hours. Also,  the game is pushing too hard to sell their ingame currency and bundles, reminds me of those cheaply made games with a sole purpose to scam your money.  Please create a better sales strategy because this game has more potential than that
BAD CONNECTION ISSUES WITH LATEST PATCH. Pretty fun, but it's never able to find a game while on 4G. I have to connect to wifi (slower!) for matchmaking to work.
Pretty good. I am able to go pretty far without purchasing anything but I am sure money makes it easier.   Only complaint is there are no PVE missions. That would totally make this a 5 star game.

I might've given 4/5 stars for this game but i rate it lower due to game lack of honesty. 90 or 80 percent chance of success means 90 or 80 percent of failure. im fed up being failed upgrade despite 90 percent chance of success failed several times on highest tier ship which req lits of golds. ssounds like a rigged slot machine but too obvious
Three different options for the controls, including a "pro" option, but  no option for inverted y-axis. Clearly the developer has no idea what pro actually means.  Uninstalled as soon as I saw that.

I am so addicted to it! I can't stop playing. It is a really good game, yet I'd like to see some added things. One thing I'd like to see is side guns that only shoot to the side and things like that. I think it'd make combat more interesting. I'd also love to see ramming damage added or even as a weapon or a specific ship. Other than that, I love it.

About:
Have you always dreamed of spaceships and space combat space battles? Check out the first mobile online game with direct control of your own spaceship and space travel.

In Planet Commander manticore, you are the captain of a galaxy spaceship. You start with a small spaceship, but as your pilot character grows and develops, you will end up commanding huge battleships and super-heavy spaceships. Battle galaxy on fire online with real opponents in the multiplayer space wars game mode and develop your space fleet.

The galaxy on fire and space need a commander like you! Become a legend in a galaxy on fire! Let the spaceship battles begin!

Planet Commander’s online space battles features:
- 5 spacecraft interstellar spaceships classes (from light to super-heavy vehicles: frigates, destroyers, battleships, carriers, super heavy warships), each can carry a variety of equipment.
- More than 20 spaceships to choose from, entering combat with different tactics.
- Each space battleship can be fully customized and improved: Planet Commander features over 100 different armaments and modules. You can even add your own logo and repaint your ship!
- Eve online dreadnought spaceships ""like"" gameplay
- Beautiful homeworld locations: enter battles aboard spacecraft with your squad in space as well as within planetary atmospheres and space exploration!
- Awesome space game mobile 3D graphics!

description: Be the world's best chef! Get cooking and serve delicious dishes! Show off your culinary creativity to impress your hungry diners, get rewarded and progress to become a real master chef!UNLEASH YOUR CULINARY GENIUS!  Put on your apron and start the cooking as you get familiar with your fully equipped kitchen! Raid the refrigerator to collect your ingredients and begin preparing your favorite foods. Chop, bake, fry or BBQ, add condiments to customize and serve a perfect culinary creation! MANAGE YOUR RESTAURANT! It's all up to you as you learn to run your own restaurant! Welcome your hungry diners and introduce them to your delicious menu. Find the dish that's right for them, serve their order as they wanted and earn coins for making your customers happy! Will you be able to progress to master chef?AMAZING ANIMATIONS! Meet all of Dr. Panda's fun friends in this exciting new game. Enjoy the beautiful animations and the fun reactions! Cook up some crazy food combinations or sneak a few extra chilies on their pizza and share some giggles as they gobble it all up. Key Features:- Unleash your creativity and be the best chef in the world.- Over 20 ingredients and condiments to choose from! - Learn how to run your very own restaurant!- Make pizzas, burgers, pasta and more!- Be rewarded and level up for your culinary talent!- Master all the different kitchen tools! - Play at your own pace with no time limits! - Fun for toddlers, children, teenagers and adults alike.- Safe for kids! COPPA compliant and no third party ads- Try Dr. Panda Restaurant 3 for free!Educational Values:- Kids learn basic cooking methods for different types of recipes.  - Get familiar with different ingredients and handy cooking tools.  - Become receptive to customer's facial responses based on what they like and don't like.   - Kids can role-play and develop storytelling skills.Dr. Panda Restaurant 3 is a free educational game for kids offering in-app purchases to unlock additional content. These are one-time purchases which will permanently unlock the content for your account. Please check your device settings for more detailed parental options regarding in-app purchases, and feel free to contact us at support@drpanda.com if you have feedback or concerns.Privacy Policy As a designer of kids’ games, we understand how important privacy is in this modern, digital world. You can read our privacy policy here: http://www.drpanda.com/privacy About Dr. PandaDr. Panda is a developer of games for kids. We develop games with educational values that help kids learn about the world. All of our games are safe and do not contain inappropriate content.If you’d like to know more about us and how we design games for kids, visit our website www.drpanda.com/about. If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email at support@drpanda.com or contact us on Facebook (www.facebook.com/drpandagames) or Twitter (www.twitter.com/drpandagames) or Instagram (www.instagram.com/drpandagames).
descriptionHTML:
Be the world's best chef! Get cooking and serve delicious dishes! Show off your culinary creativity to impress your hungry diners, get rewarded and progress to become a real master chef!

UNLEASH YOUR CULINARY GENIUS!  
Put on your apron and start the cooking as you get familiar with your fully equipped kitchen! Raid the refrigerator to collect your ingredients and begin preparing your favorite foods. Chop, bake, fry or BBQ, add condiments to customize and serve a perfect culinary creation!

MANAGE YOUR RESTAURANT!
It's all up to you as you learn to run your own restaurant! Welcome your hungry diners and introduce them to your delicious menu. Find the dish that's right for them, serve their order as they wanted and earn coins for making your customers happy! Will you be able to progress to master chef?

AMAZING ANIMATIONS!
Meet all of Dr. Panda's fun friends in this exciting new game. Enjoy the beautiful animations and the fun reactions! Cook up some crazy food combinations or sneak a few extra chilies on their pizza and share some giggles as they gobble it all up.

Key Features:
- Unleash your creativity and be the best chef in the world.
- Over 20 ingredients and condiments to choose from!
- Learn how to run your very own restaurant!
- Make pizzas, burgers, pasta and more!
- Be rewarded and level up for your culinary talent!
- Master all the different kitchen tools!
- Play at your own pace with no time limits!
- Fun for toddlers, children, teenagers and adults alike.
- Safe for kids! COPPA compliant and no third party ads
- Try Dr. Panda Restaurant 3 for free!

Educational Values:
- Kids learn basic cooking methods for different types of recipes.  
- Get familiar with different ingredients and handy cooking tools.
- Become receptive to customer's facial responses based on what they like and don't like.
- Kids can role-play and develop storytelling skills.

Dr. Panda Restaurant 3 is a free educational game for kids offering in-app purchases to unlock additional content. These are one-time purchases which will permanently unlock the content for your account. Please check your device settings for more detailed parental options regarding in-app purchases, and feel free to contact us at support@drpanda.com if you have feedback or concerns.

Privacy Policy
As a designer of kids’ games, we understand how important privacy is in this modern, digital world. You can read our privacy policy here: http://www.drpanda.com/privacy

About Dr. Panda
Dr. Panda is a developer of games for kids. We develop games with educational values that help kids learn about the world. All of our games are safe and do not contain inappropriate content.

If you’d like to know more about us and how we design games for kids, visit our website www.drpanda.com/about. If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email at support@drpanda.com or contact us on Facebook (www.facebook.com/drpandagames) or Twitter (www.twitter.com/drpandagames) or Instagram (www.instagram.com/drpandagames).

comments: Its awesome but why is their no idle cash when you aren't playing? I thought thats what 100 coins per min was

Loved this game!!! It is my new favorite game I love all the powerful weapons and armor. I wish there was chestplates instead of amulets and leggings instead of bracelets and an easier way to find out what your hero level, But else then that it was perfect. I loved how you can choose the controls to your own preference. Chame on anyone who gave it a less then 5 Star review. I still dont know ho to tell what your hero level was but still my favorite game.

I AM OBSESSED!!! This game is awesome, I love shooting things that deserve to be shot!!! The only problem is that you need to be a certain level to buy something and how there's only boots and helmets, and no chest plates or leggings, but when I first played it I was shocked to find 2 problems in an amazing app! 5 stars everything! Also, you should make huge, amazing looking, almost impossible bosses that will make me flip my table when I can't beat them! Keep making more awesome games!

I can't help but love a mobile game that doesn't constantly shove advertisements in your face. No silly energy system to make you wait to play, and while it has a real money store, it's tucked away in a corner where it belongs. Different control options and simple, accessible gameplay make this a hidden gem. 5 stars all the way. Kudos to the developer.

I'm really loving this game it's simple but still a ton of fun. My one complaint would be the sometimes the grind is too long and I almost gave up... I wish the developers would throw in some kind of experience boost in the store instead of just being able to buy coins. I would pay real money for an exp boost and would love to support the Developers! just give me the chance!

I understand that people want their games to be entartaining. But i dont understand why there is a thing that downgrades your item upon trying to upgrade it. I have soent the last 3 hours trying to upgrade my helm to lvl 15. Guess where it is now, On goddamn lvl 11. I have spent less time grinding mounts in wow than getting my gear to lvl 15. Stupidest thing ever. One tip. Play the campagin lvls to lvl 40. Then dont do campagin at all and run hell for gold and xp. Repeqt to lvl 80 and then get rekt by the stupid item upgrade system.

comments: This game was absolutely perfect and was very much enjoyable, but now to unlock the full experience you have to pay. One of the reasons I enjoy this game and recommended it to my friends is because it is one of the only games that isn't locked behind a paywall. Overall, I have had countless hours playing this game, and trying to land on everything and return successfully. Instead of the microtransaction, why not institute a merit-based system for unlocking parts?

Very great!  Here are a few suggestion from me to make your game more enjoyable :)  1. Can you please make the earth scale correctly because its diameter is around 12.000 km and moon orbit is around 380.000 km  2. Please make a smaller powerful engine like the 9 engines of the falcon 9  3. Please make a button that is simple to cycle from another rocket to another one to ease the attempt of landing a booster  4. Please add an ocean on the earth for some splashdown  5. The last one. Im a free 2 play player and i cant enjoy a majority of the new update :*(

This game is awsome. Loads of fun. Told my friends about it. Could you add a free sandbox mode and more free parts. Thanks. Keep up the good work. Shouldn't have added micro transactions. It just ruined the game for me. Had to take it from a 5 star to a 3 star. Please bear this comment in mind for future updates. This game was 100% free when i downloaded it in december last year. Since then, you added a new build system, free parts which make the game absolutely amazing, and then you add pay for parts. Thats just buzzkill.

Very fast and simple rocket building and great graphics. I wish there was a sandbox mode with infinite fuel. Also there is no indication for loading screens when you hit the launch button. Somethimes you think you tapped the button and end up sitting there for a minute or two wasting time.  Edit So glad they made a small payment option. Well worth the money and glad to support

Great!  Only thing I miss is the ability to rendezvous and dock with another object.  In a moon landing, you could leave a stage in lunar orbit and pick it up for the outbound burn.  Also, karman line should be 100 km??  Edit:. Great updates.  I have no idea how to use docking to reattach parts that have been undocked though.

Can you please add option to center the map on the rocket/vehicle when being in the map mode? It is difficult to switch between near objects in the current version, since I assume the map is stationary relative to the body in which influence sphere we're in at that moment. Also, a "docking guide" would be cool in some future update
description: This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!• Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.• Realistic orbital mechanics• Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.Current planets and moons:• Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)• Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)• Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)• Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)• Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)• Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9CVideo tutorials: Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQMoon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8
descriptionHTML:
This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!

• Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.
• Realistic orbital mechanics
• Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.

Current planets and moons:
• Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)
• Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)
• Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)
• Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)
• Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)
• Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)

Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9C

Video tutorials:
Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQ
Moon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8
developerAddress: Leona Zalaznika 4 Maribor
recentChanges: Added: Fairings, Probes, RCS, Solar panels and one new engine [Free].
Increased build space height by 2 [Free].
Added option to get a parts extension with: Docking, Rovers and Big parts and Extra build space (The extension also includes ALL future parts), I really tried to make this the best deal I can :P
Quick fix: Fixed problem with purchase, if your problem is still there, try restarting or reinstalling.
Major performance improvements.
Added clear all debris button.
summary: Space has never been this easy, or this hard!
title: Spaceflight Simulator

comments: Mars: Mars is a very fun game in which you take platforming and collectables to the next level. The game takes you a thrilling adventure, and although the object stays the same I find myself never growing bored. The way that each new character changes the level is just awesome. Each character is well thought out and designed amazingly. If you're looking for a game to pull out in a waiting room, or while you're bored - then give this game a shot. You definitely won't regret it.

It's definitely a fun game. But I cannot figure out where the in app purchases are! I looked everywhere within the app and there is absolutely no place where I can find in app purchases!! But play store says that this game supports in app purchases. So I'm very confused! Can someone please help me out here??
Its awesomr and makes the time go by so quickly. The tiniest problem is that the gas is too little, but thats the point of the game!

This game has so much potential... I started playing and immediately enjoyed it, they've got the game mechanics perfect, everything is easy to get into and the core gameplay is pretty fun. But simple. This usually isn't a problem because game designers usually build complexity ont on top of simple mechanics. Not these guys. The vast majority of jumping platforms, which is all this game is, are incredibly easy to do once you get the hang of it. And that's it. The game doesn't progress at all. It never gets harder. There are some trees and eventually a couple black holes to avoid. Like I mean 3 in the first 100 platforms. Then after platform 100 and something they introduce this drum symbol thing that you can bounce off of. Do they design jumps that implement these bouncy things in a fun and exciting way? Nope. You just go around them. I made it to platform 200 before I finally gave up. This is just lazy game developing.
A great game for relaxing and honing your jetpack skills. It becomes a little boring after a while though, seeing as it's primarily the same activity over and over again. Otherwise perfect =]

Such a great, simple, enjoyable game. I love the visual effects, the art team did a great job. Sound design is great too. I agree that the game is easy once you get a hang of it, but so are games like agario or *cough cough* all of ketchapp *cough cough*  Honestly the devs did excellent, even with ad implementation, all around 10/10 game
description: MarsCorp is ready to take the first group of volunteers on an exciting mission to Mars! Fly around Mars in one of our brand new jetpacks and discover what’s out there.As part of the “Put A Human On Mars No Matter What” program, we are proud to announce that MarsCorp is the first company cutting enough corners to make human flights to Mars finally viable. So-called “professional” astronauts will tell you things like “No sane person would travel across space on that thing” or “The fuel on that jetpack lasts about 30 seconds”, but you can prove them wrong! Here’s your chance to make history!- Explore Mars on a jetpack.- Take selfies on Mars's greatest sightings.- Avoid Rapid Unscheduled Disassemblies.- Have fun!

description: You’re gonna LOVE this babysitting kids game!Get ready for some babysitter madness, with newborn baby cuties and baby twins. First days are hectic! Baby care takes a lot of work! Let’s hope these adorable babies like you! You’ll have such a blast babysitting. Feed them, play with them, give them baths, and more, in this crazy fun kids game!These adorable newborn baby cuties and baby twins are so lucky - they’ve got the best babysitter in the world - yes, YOU!!! The little ones are in need of a super babysitter. Let’s see if you got what it takes! You’ll need to take care of them and do everything you can to keep them happy. But don’t worry - baby care is hard work, but also SO much fun! Enjoy this fabulous kids game, and become a babysitting pro!Features:> Baby care fun time! Babysit so many cute babies - including newborn baby cuties, baby twins and toddlers, in your favorite new babysitting kids game! > Bake cookies with the babies and feed them yummy and healthy snacks and lunches. > Babies LOVE bubbles. descriptionHTML:
You’re gonna LOVE this babysitting kids game!
Get ready for some babysitter madness, with newborn baby cuties and baby twins. First days are hectic! Baby care takes a lot of work! Let’s hope these adorable babies like you! You’ll have such a blast babysitting. Feed them, play with them, give them baths, and more, in this crazy fun kids game!

These adorable newborn baby cuties and baby twins are so lucky - they’ve got the best babysitter in the world - yes, YOU!!!
The little ones are in need of a super babysitter. Let’s see if you got what it takes! You’ll need to take care of them and do everything you can to keep them happy. But don’t worry - baby care is hard work, but also SO much fun! Enjoy this fabulous kids game, and become a babysitting pro!

Features:
> Baby care fun time! Babysit so many cute babies - including newborn baby cuties, baby twins and toddlers, in your favorite new babysitting kids game!
> Bake cookies with the babies and feed them yummy and healthy snacks and lunches.
> Babies LOVE bubbles. Let them splash around in a bubble bath.
> Take the little cuties to the playground and play with them in the sandbox.
> Have a baby festival! Dress them up in magical costumes so they can put on a great show!
> Take the babies to the beach. Build sandcastles and play with the beach ball.
> Keep a baby care diary with cute baby and pet pictures, and their first locks of hair.
> Have fun arts and crafts time with the newborn baby cuties and baby twins. Make toys and dolls, paint pictures & more! This babysitting kids game has so many activities!
> Tell the babies fairy tale stories, and teach them their ABC’s.
> Play puzzles, blow up balloons, and have a blast with the babies!
> It’s cleanup time in the nursery! Make sure the babies’ room is sparkling clean.
> Change the babies’ dirty diapers.
> Bedtime! Tuck the little newborn baby cuties and baby twins into their cribs and sing them a lullabye. Good job today, babysitter!

description: Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans! It brings together traditional drawing tools and some magical surprises that little ones will love. You can draw straight onto canvas or choose a background or character to color in. Peppa and George will pop in from time to time to see how you are getting on and once you are done drawing, you can have your very own exhibition at Peppa's school! comments: Overall, the game is pretty cool. But, I feel much more can be added though. Great game. Just more needs to be added. It's a great app I wish the devs could make like, Sandbox modes where you can build your own... Em... Coasters? I dunno. You had to verify them first. Annnd in order to verify them you had to complete them yourself. Then you could publish them. And maybe a two player mode? Not sure how that's gonna work out. That's all that could be added. Most of all. 3 and a half out of 5 stars.

The only way to play online is Facebook and Google play! First, you can make a 3rd option for an in-game name, like in Clash Of Clans,  and make the Google play account optional if you don't want to download Google play (not meaning that Google play is bad). Many people can not even think of any name that is not already taken in Google play (including me). It still is a good game,just it needs some more work.

Don't get me wrong, it's amazing and seems to be fun, but there's one thing that ruins it all. Whenever I open the game, everything shifts to the right quite a bit, so I can't see about one fifth of the screen, which doesn't allow me to use the button control setup, and some other things. Would love to see this get fixed, as the game has some nice potential.

As much as I want to love this game, its also quite cheap. Every single race, the same "real" players are always there regardless of time of day. They follow the same route and incredibly make no mistakes at all! Meanwhile, I'm getting stuck on every edge, my wheel gets stuck in the ground and every single gate smashes only me. Amazing!! Its a super fun game but don't think for a second that it plays fair.

Love this game for the cool clip art graphics with all the chaos. Relly funny when they crash. Lol i just dont like the constant ads gou have to watcg when ever you have to open a prize chest and when you win. I mean you win and then you gotta watch a clip for 30 secs, then it feels like you lose. Lol

Thankyou gor being creative i wish you add more challenge : crash crush. That is like just crush using vlad and rufus (example) and then crush make them crush so who is the winner. Using that game we can know who is the stronger

description: Grow Empire: Rome is a captivating game, mixing tower defense (TD) and strategy mechanisms with role playing (RPG) elements.You are Caesar, mighty leader of the Roman republic, your objective is to defeat other civilizations in ancient Europe with an army made-up of roman soldiers, siege weapons, heroes and barbarian mercenaries. Be ready for War!Turn a small republic in the heart of the Italian peninsula into the greatest civilization the world has ever seen. Lead a bunch of weak peasants into the fierceness of battle to turn them into invincible warriors.Upgrade your stronghold to defend from the most fearful barbarian's clans and armies from Italy, Gallium, Carthage and Iberian peninsula. comments: Awesome game! Only issue is on season 7. Race with save 8 seconds on perfect drift.... it says 3 laps but one lap doesn't count so you have to do 4 laps and you can never save 8 seconds. To test is on lvl 1 first corner accelerate and turn left (any set of controls tried all) it will start turning right seems to be when the prospective changes. Looks like it would be good if it went where you tell it to. Might be due to latest patch so will try again if it get fixed

Awesome Game... no need to spend money to get best cards you can easily earn them... Can play offline too... There is a glitch though in season 7 - save 8 second stage... even after finishing it wont give 3 stars and fails me.

Good game, really fun. On season 7 the 6th drift game you cant pass it. When you cross the finish line it says wrong way and doesnt let you finish the gane to get the last star. You end up doing 4 laps, even with 20 secnonds still on the clock. Please fix the issue so I can complete the season

Graphics are good, my phone can handle the very high settings so I haven't played on the lower settings.

Love the game. However, after finishing the race, an ad pops up and after closing it, the screen is all black and it stays that way. It happened to me a number of times. description: Paper Toss Boss: more papery, tossy, and bossy than ever before! (It’s cool, tossy is a word now, don’t worry about it.) There are tons of things to throw and oodles of things to throw them at! Score.-16 unique items to toss, from classic wads of paper to the epic rubber band ball-10 dynamic environments of varying difficulty in which to toss around -Break, blow up, and burn the objects found around the office-Toss stuff at the Boss and other co-workers to annoy them (in game, not real life — but we won’t tell if you pretend it’s real life)-Missions offer challenges to show off your paper (and non-paper) tossing skills in exchange for awesome rewards-Moving targets, bank shots, and bunches of baskets will test the true prowess of your paper tossing skills -Power-ups boost your scores and mix up the gameplay for a variety of fun ways to toss -Google Play leaderboards and achievements so you can challenge your friends and smite your adversariesRemember those pesky “Hey, you hit me!” co-workers from the original Paper Toss? descriptionHTML:
Paper Toss Boss: more papery, tossy, and bossy than ever before! (It’s cool, tossy is a word now, don’t worry about it.) There are tons of things to throw and oodles of things to throw them at! Score.

-16 unique items to toss, from classic wads of paper to the epic rubber band ball
-10 dynamic environments of varying difficulty in which to toss around
-Break, blow up, and burn the objects found around the office
-Toss stuff at the Boss and other co-workers to annoy them (in game, not real life — but we won’t tell if you pretend it’s real life)
-Missions offer challenges to show off your paper (and non-paper) tossing skills in exchange for awesome rewards
-Moving targets, bank shots, and bunches of baskets will test the true prowess of your paper tossing skills
-Power-ups boost your scores and mix up the gameplay for a variety of fun ways to toss
-Google Play leaderboards and achievements so you can challenge your friends and smite your adversaries

Remember those pesky “Hey, you hit me!” co-workers from the original Paper Toss? Well now you can throw right at them! (You devil, you.) You’ll still score points for flicking wads of paper into the office trash can, now with a handsome new ergonomic design! Plus, try your skills with flaming paper balls, tossable bananas, tomatoes, grenades, and other fun stuff to hurl in classic office settings and more. What are you waiting for?! Get tossing!

Install Paper Toss Boss for FREE today!
PLEASE NOTE! Paper Toss Boss is completely free to play, but some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.

comments: Do not spend any money on this game. This used to be one of the best slot games until the developers got greedy. Payouts are small and events are nearly impossible. They try to make it all sound good but it's not. They also changed the customer service on here where it's hard to get anyone. You cannot message them on Facebook if you have a problem and if you say anything negative about the game you will be blocked. Hope this review saves some of you some time so you can find a better game!

What the hell kind of question is that?  "Is it beautiful".... meaning the game! HOW NOT PERTAINING TO ANY GAMES!  Anyway,  this game is hands down the best Slot game EVER!  Have played slots in and out of casino's for over 20 years and this is the one to play! A huge variety of Casino games,  easy to maneuver and a lot of really nice people.

I used to love this game but something they did changed it. Winning is nearly impossible even if you are a paying customer. I know it is a game of luck but when you purchase 85 silver tickets you should be able to complete puzzles when you only need 1 piece for each of them. Make winning a little easier and people will be happy to spend money.  I think the game is broken. I was just playing in a room on Billionaire with a person who was playing on Huge Casino. I know it's the same developer but I don't think that is supposed to happen. I know the person was playing Huge Casino because it was my husband playing it. May want to look into it.

Customer relations are horrible even non existent. If you spend money you will lose far more than you win, in their eyes you will spend even more. If you send a message they will hide behind a canned "industry standard" response. This is not a free standing casino there are no freebies and you can't collect any winnings. Yet they have their games dialed in so you lose in hopes you will spend money. Horrible company.

I just started this account in hopes of recovering my lost one. If it goes smoothly, I am happy with the app to date. The slots don't pay as much as they used to, a little tite , otherwise a fun app. The events they choose for you to play, daily, do steal a lot of chips. If u want to remain in a successful club, you must do them, is the main downfall. I would recommend it to my friends.

This is an interesting game. After I played it for awhile it became very boring. Haven't gotten a big or any good win for the past 70 million. I guess if you buy chips you might win more often. It doesn't give you all the bonuses, and it takes gifts and doesn't give them to the gamers you gave it to. So all in all it's just okay. I've never been able to get anywhere with their support team as they added to my reply. I'd give it a one star but if you buy chips it might be better.

comments: Amazing game that I randomly came across. I simply love how simple the game is. JUST TAP YOUR SCREEN AND EARN COINS AND UPGRADES! It's so awesome and I absolutely love how everything is pixelated and that makes it more charming. Not to mention that the music is fantastic as well and I never get tired of listening to it!

This would be a fine time-waster if they reign in the ads, until that happens, about like the plague.  They started out as a means to (optional) easy buffs. Fine, annoying, but not that bad. Suddenly, random ads are popping up in the middle of the game and you get nothing out of it. Totally unacceptable way to run a game. Don't bother, there are thousands of other time wasting idle/incremental games that show an ounce of respect for their customers. These guys simply don't.

Love this game because you don't have to spend real money, just tap the screen to get coins and also diamonds then upgrade the guns, rinse and repeat but it never gets boring. Only trouble I've had is a sore tapping finger. LOL

this game is basically an app for watching ads. you are forced to watch ads in order to progress. on the top of that, when you upgrade your stuff, the game randomly starts an ad. to have double money, you have to watch an ad. to collect diamonds.. guess what, watch an ad. to start idle mode? yes, watch an ad. utterly disgusting, terrible design.
A great fully free game. It is a bit ad heavy but absolutely no microtransactions so I'm fine with supporting them that way. Very fun game definitely worth a play
Holy ads! Intrusive ads every few clicks. EVERYTHING is ad-based. Good gameplay, but obviously an app created to generate ad revenue.

comments: I have started playing this when i saw how much my wife enjoys and she is not a game person. Good for passing time even when watching TV. This man is a pensioner. I am on  stage 890 and have been wondering if i will ever get to the tree top. Review by player indicated that he is on stage 3410. That takes playing.

Hi I like the game as it gives a sense of achievement at every level but doesn't require too much appreciation. I used to play this to calm myself.   But now my phone crashed and I lost the progress.   Is there a way to get it back
It's not simple & it's not hard. I like this game because there are only a few interruptions!  Ads can be shut off after 5 seconds or so.  I'm already nearing 500 level! Very addictive!

I like the game a lot, it helps with quelling anxiety.  I have reached and completed level 3410, and there doesn't seem to be anything past that. I checked to see if the game needs an update, but it seems that that isn't the issue.

I love this app because it's just enough of a challenge so it can be done without being boring or getting so frustrated your ready to throw your phone across the room.  It isn't rigged to fail like so many games today!  UPDATE:  I've just reached level 1,600 and still enjoy the game every much as I did from level 1!  I honestly can't say that about any other game.  This is a great game for just passing the time, or challenge yourself to get 3 stars by studying all possible ways to complete the task.  YOU choose how much effort to put into it.
Scores would be much higher if the special features were explained. I only found out what the Flowers do by trying it.

comments: I'm enjoying this game by exploring and unlocking new land. Love the graphics and the colours. One thing I don't like is the amount of energy you use or have. You can't really do much on a daily basic despite eatting food. Good story line so far. I can't wait to find out more.

I want to love this game.  It's pretty. The characters are adorable.  The concept is creative. However, the controls are challenging at best. Also, gathering enough sunshine to do anything is mind-numbingly slow.  Thank you devs for neat but unplayable game.

The storyline is a great idea, but unfortunately the execution iof this game is rubbish. Despite the lengthy and slow "click the cloud" interactions with in-game characters, instructions are so minimal that you get very bored with working out what you are supposed to do.  Graphics aren't really impressive, and although it is perfectly easy to understand how to move your character around the screen, doing so in these ways is a pain. I really wanted to like this game, but frankly it feels a bit like playing something a couple of decades older.
I really like this game, the controls are cool, the characters, story, and graphics are good, the only problems I have with the controls are because I'm not used to them.

This game is a good combination of previous games I have played all rolled up in one..of about at least six different ones but basically a really good game..just such a long wait between portals..and getting or making sunstones but still a cool game.
Except for when you can't reset a puzzle and have to close out the portal I like the game.

descriptionHTML:
*** Hungry Shark World Selected in Google Play’s Best Games of 2016 collection ***
The Sharks are back in the bigger and badder sequel to Hungry Shark Evolution!
Control a shark in a feeding frenzy and eat your way through many oceans feasting on everything from bite-size fish and birds to tasty whales and unwitting humans!
***This game is only compatible with devices running on Android 4.2 or above***

MORE THAN 20 SHARK SPECIES
Choose from a range of sharks in 7 different size tiers, including the most iconic ocean predator: the Great White!

HUGE OPEN WORLDS
Explore the lush Pacific Islands, frozen Arctic Ocean, exotic Arabian Sea, and now the South China Sea, a vibrant urban destination full of fresh, unwary victims!

FEAST FOR YOUR EYES
Experience the feeding frenzy in stunning console quality 3D graphics that will blow everything else out of the water!

SURVIVAL OF THE HUNGRIEST
It’s eat or be eaten in waters packed with 100s of delicious and dangerous creatures… Whales, submarines and wandering locals BEWARE!

SMASHING SHARK SWAG
Level up your shark and equip jawsome gadgets to bite harder, swim faster and grow even hungrier! No shark is complete without headphones, umbrella and a freakin' jetpack!

MANIC MISSIONS & BADASS BOSSES
Take on more than 20 different types of mission including high score challenges, prey hunts and epic boss fights!

HELPFUL PREDATORY PETS
Baby sharks, whales, an octopus, and even a bald eagle are happy to help with special abilities to increase health, score and more!

SUPERSIZED MEAL DEAL
Unleash your shark's predator potential: SuperSize mode, rushes, explosion, hypnosis and more!

INTUITIVE TILT CONTROLS
Back by popular demand, now you can control your shark simply by tilting your phone!

Google Play Leaderboards and Achievements enabled.
Use Facebook to synchronise your progress across your GP devices.
Hungry Shark World is regularly updated with new features, content and challenges to keep you coming back for more!
This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gems and Gold currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Gold can also be collected in game without requiring purchases.
This game contains advertising. Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

Like the game on Facebook for the latest news: www.facebook.com/HungryShark
Follow us on Twitter @Hungry_Shark
Or Youtube: http://youtube.com/FutureGamesOfLondon
And join our community!

comments: I absolutely love this game! I got it only a week ago as I have played it previously on other peoples devices and it did not disappoint!  However one problem is the game not unlocking vehicles, maps, and helmets. The biggest example of this is the turbo turtles mission. I am somehow not able to unlock the turtle and skeleton knight even after completing it in various different ways. Even so, this game is an absolute must have for people who want to have a mix of competitiveness and fun!

Amazing game love 2 player mode with my friends. There is just a few bugs  in single player and daily tournament. Please spawning mechanic's they are broken. New level 'Fastest treasure catcher' lags every time you collect a trophy

Phew. I thought I lost it all. Somehow everything is back. The only thing wrong now is once sudden death starts it stays. The water keeps rising and the blades keep lowering. Please fix this bug then the game will be perfect.

Devs! In the new update I am unable to retrieve my boss raid little. Any daily rewards and all the daily challenges are not available as it said it is " completed" I lost my 77 day daily login streak! Please fix. Phone is google pixel 1
I like the game but, the controls need some more work, because I will turn one way, and it's too slow and I die! Please work on the controls 😁? I love the game!😘

It would be better if there was a feature that let you see your daily challenge without having to play a random single player game and then finding it and then quitting that match anyways this is a great game. Play it when you are waiting for something.
description: Drive Ahead! is a gladiator car fight. Wreck your friends by knocking their helmets with a variety of cars from monster trucks to alien saucers! Hundreds of cars and levels bring endless hours of helmet-crashing action and freak accidents!You can play Drive Ahead! in four game modes. Battle your friends in two-player matches in local multiplayer on the same device or over WiFi! Explore stadium missions featuring dinosaurs, aliens and robots! Reduce the unworthy to wrecks and reign supreme in King of the Hill! Share your best Superstar Stadium replays for a shot at featuring inside the game! Will you be the next Drive Ahead superstar?!Customize your battles or go random for crazy matchups! Can you best a monster truck with a go-kart? Hiding won't help - sudden death brings sawblades, rain of fire and flash floods. The only defense is ruthless offense!Collect virtual credits and use them in the Prize Machine to unlock tons of cars and loads of arenas as you play!We would love to hear your feedback. You can email us at driveahead [at] dodreams [dot] com or follow us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/DriveAheadGame). Here is our Privacy Policy: http://dodreams.com/pdf/dodreams_policy.pdf.Are you enjoying Drive Ahead? Help us make more fun games like this by rating and reviewing it!
descriptionHTML:
Drive Ahead! is a gladiator car fight. Wreck your friends by knocking their helmets with a variety of cars from monster trucks to alien saucers! Hundreds of cars and levels bring endless hours of helmet-crashing action and freak accidents!

You can play Drive Ahead! in four game modes. Battle your friends in two-player matches in local multiplayer on the same device or over WiFi! Explore stadium missions featuring dinosaurs, aliens and robots! Reduce the unworthy to wrecks and reign supreme in King of the Hill! Share your best Superstar Stadium replays for a shot at featuring inside the game! Will you be the next Drive Ahead superstar?!

Customize your battles or go random for crazy matchups! Can you best a monster truck with a go-kart? Hiding won't help - sudden death brings sawblades, rain of fire and flash floods. The only defense is ruthless offense!

Collect virtual credits and use them in the Prize Machine to unlock tons of cars and loads of arenas as you play!

We would love to hear your feedback. You can email us at driveahead [at] dodreams [dot] com or follow us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/DriveAheadGame). Here is our Privacy Policy: http://dodreams.com/pdf/dodreams_policy.pdf.

comments: This app would be fine if it weren't for the incessant ads and the really annoying movement that it does when you didn't even press the direction that it's going. Sometimes it will double move when you've only pressed to move once and you can only undo one time so you're basically screwed. I got up to over 447 thousand and it did this and ruined it all. Then it plays loud ads.

Awesome game I have basically mastered this game. Got a high score of 2,892,204. I made the highest tile which is 131,072. This game is amazing and requires intense focus. I lost focus for a second and a 4 appeared and I didn't notice. Messed me up when I was about to make the 65k tile
best beain adict game. but 9 grid stage doesnt fulfill. not enough grid box. the Creator cheated. i m going to lodge a complaint against you. you ve to answer my brain😀 anyway superr game excellent

When i started the game first time... first it asked money to remove add...have some patience . If a persons likes your game he or she will definitely pay you ...it is like you are asking a guest money to enter your house... nonsense

The game is great, but the leaderboards are seriously messed up.  The top high scores are literally orders of magnitude higher than it is physically possible to get.  I would assume that they have been "hacked" somehow to display these fake scores.  The developer should cap the high score at the number that is literally the highest possible score (based on the size of the board)

I enjoy 2048 alot. I play it alot and I would consider myself pretty good, my high score is 250,000. When i was building on that high score, the screen glitched and swiped a number of times, ruining the order of the numbers. This has happened on multiple occasions only in this app. It's not such a big problem for people that are newer, but when you've got big numbers, such as 8192, it makes the game unplayable.
description: - The classic 2048 puzzle is a fun, addictive and a very simple number puzzle game. You join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! - This 2048 game is an upgraded version of the current popular 2048 game. This is a super 2048 puzzle, it supports classic (4x4), big (5x5), bigger (6x6) and huge (8x8) board sizes. Be ready for a new challenge! HOW TO PLAY: Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins! 8 .. 16 ... 1024 .. 2048. To access Leaderboard, you will have to sign in using google plus account.FEATURES- Classic (4x4), big (5x5), bigger (6x6) and huge (8x8) board options!- Super 2048 Plus puzzle game- Keep playing for High-score after collected 2048 tile- Game is automatically saved- One Undo move support- Beautiful and simple UI- High score- Leaderboard- Completely native implementation
descriptionHTML:
- The classic 2048 puzzle is a fun, addictive and a very simple number puzzle game. You join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!
- This 2048 game is an upgraded version of the current popular 2048 game. This is a super 2048 puzzle, it supports classic (4x4), big (5x5), bigger (6x6) and huge (8x8) board sizes. Be ready for a new challenge!

HOW TO PLAY:
Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins! 8 .. 16 ... 1024 .. 2048. To access Leaderboard, you will have to sign in using google plus account.

FEATURES
- Classic (4x4), big (5x5), bigger (6x6) and huge (8x8) board options!
- Super 2048 Plus puzzle game
- Keep playing for High-score after collected 2048 tile
- Game is automatically saved
- One Undo move support
- Beautiful and simple UI
- High score
- Leaderboard
- Completely native implementation
